gravelmon.midnightconfig.title: Gravelmon Config
cobblemon.species.eghobulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
cobblemon.species.eghobulbasaur.desc: The plants that grow on Bulbasaur use its body for nutrients. Bulbasaur relies on the plant for protection.
cobblemon.species.eghoivysaur.name: Ivysaur
cobblemon.species.eghoivysaur.desc: As the body of Ivysaur dries up, it grows a patch of dense vines that aid it in battle.
cobblemon.species.eghovenusaur.name: Venusaur
cobblemon.species.eghovenusaur.desc: Large, thorn covered brambles protect an aged cactus. Small rodent Pokémon tend to make nests in the dry grass patches at the base of the cactus.
cobblemon.species.eghocharmander.name: Charmander
cobblemon.species.eghocharmander.desc: A small dragon Pokémon that enjoys a competitive bout. As it battles, the flame on its tail gets hotter.
cobblemon.species.eghocharmeleon.name: Charmeleon
cobblemon.species.eghocharmeleon.desc: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
cobblemon.species.eghocharizard.name: Charizard
cobblemon.species.eghocharizard.desc: A powerful dragon Pokémon that is said to be hard to tame. It likes to soar high above the clouds.
cobblemon.species.eghosquirtle.name: Squirtle
cobblemon.species.eghosquirtle.desc: Squirtle produces a small cloud as a tail that it then uses to float on top of and keep itself cool. They can often be found snoozing, sprawled out on their own cloud.
cobblemon.species.eghowartortle.name: Wartortle
cobblemon.species.eghowartortle.desc: Wartortle's body starts to develop even more cloud forms, allowing it to temporarily hover sometimes. It uses the cloud as a cloak during foggy days.
cobblemon.species.eghoblastoise.name: Blastoise
cobblemon.species.eghoblastoise.desc: Blastoise drift around high in the sky, forming ice crystals on their shell that they use in battle once they've landed.
cobblemon.species.eghospearow.name: Spearow
cobblemon.species.eghospearow.desc: These Spearow became an invasive species because it had no natural predators. In order to stay at the top of the food chain, it adapted into a vicious predator.
cobblemon.species.eghofearow.name: Fearow
cobblemon.species.eghofearow.desc: Because its wings are too thin to fly effectively, it instead uses them as weapons, fanning them out to sweep opponents in all directions.
cobblemon.species.eghooddish.name: Oddish
cobblemon.species.eghooddish.desc: As Oddish's habitat changed, it failed to adapt quick enough, which caused its leafs to wilt. Nowadays, these Oddish can be seen in dark caves and forests.
cobblemon.species.eghogloom.name: Gloom
cobblemon.species.eghogloom.desc: Despite their abiotic features, when exposed to enough light, Oddish may evolve into Gloom. Gloom use decorative skulls to scare away other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.eghomagnemite.name: Magnemite
cobblemon.species.eghomagnemite.desc: Once Hazeport City plateaued in urbanization, many Magnemite migrated to Genisis Forest. Over the years, they became one with the plant life.
cobblemon.species.eghomagneton.name: Magneton
cobblemon.species.eghomagneton.desc: Instead of attaching to each other like standard Magnemite, these Magneton are grown from their original Magnemite form.
cobblemon.species.eghogrimer.name: Grimer
cobblemon.species.eghogrimer.desc: This version of Grimer is made up of hot asphalt. Often used in cities to help fill potholes, this Pokémon's body reaches temperatures of just over 300 degrees.
cobblemon.species.eghomuk.name: Muk
cobblemon.species.eghomuk.desc: As Muk traverses urban areas, various debris and items get stuck in it. The differing street signs that end up in Muk help set it apart from one another.
cobblemon.species.eghoshellder.name: Shellder
cobblemon.species.eghoshellder.desc: This Shellder can often times be found attached to a Slowbro. When removed and left alone, it will hunt down other sea creatures to feed on.
cobblemon.species.eghochansey.name: Chansey
cobblemon.species.eghochansey.desc: Chansey is so obsessed with protecting eggs that it will even defend the nests of other Pokémon species. It uses its rock as a decoy egg to trick other predators.
cobblemon.species.eghotangela.name: Tangela
cobblemon.species.eghotangela.desc: After its habitat was destroyed to make way for a large city, Tangela was forced to adapt by using left over wire from the maintenance tunnels for its new body.
cobblemon.species.deltabulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
cobblemon.species.deltabulbasaur.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. The crystal growing from its back uses its mental energy to grow.
cobblemon.species.deltaivysaur.name: Ivysaur
cobblemon.species.deltaivysaur.desc: Its body naturally changes in order to help counteract the crystal's growing weight. Its crystal resonates with increased brain activity.
cobblemon.species.deltavenusaur.name: Venusaur
cobblemon.species.deltavenusaur.desc: In order to increase its psychic powers, a shard of its crystal is embedded in its forehead. Even when it sleeps, its crystal is capable of providing protection.
cobblemon.species.deltacharmander.name: Charmander
cobblemon.species.deltacharmander.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. While the flame on its tail does not appear immediately after its birth, it burns more fiercely with age.
cobblemon.species.deltacharmeleon.name: Charmeleon
cobblemon.species.deltacharmeleon.desc: Its claws tear into its foe's spirit. When facing powerful opponents, the flame on its tail gives off the appearance of a face.
cobblemon.species.deltacharizard.name: Charizard
cobblemon.species.deltacharizard.desc: The flame on its tail grows in the presence of strong opponents. Its breath gives the impression of being engulfed in magma but causes no physical harm.
cobblemon.species.deltasquirtle.name: Squirtle
cobblemon.species.deltasquirtle.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. Though its shell causes it to stand out when hiding in the shadows, it conceals itself using the cloth on its back.
cobblemon.species.deltawartortle.name: Wartortle
cobblemon.species.deltawartortle.desc: Its tail splits to better conceal the back of its shell while it waits for foes. Its gloves help better channel its inner spirit energy.
cobblemon.species.deltablastoise.name: Blastoise
cobblemon.species.deltablastoise.desc: Though its shell now blends in with the darkness, it welcomes foolish opponents who attack it from behind. It concentrates its spirit into blasts of energy.
cobblemon.species.deltapidgey.name: Pidgey
cobblemon.species.deltapidgey.desc: A Delta Species discovered by RuneBlad3. It uses its piercing gaze to petrify foes and then perches on top of their immobile bodies.
cobblemon.species.deltapidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
cobblemon.species.deltapidgeotto.desc: This Pokémon stealthily creeps around caves and labyrinths, hoping to catch intruders off guard with its glare. It avoids mirrors and pools of water at all costs.
cobblemon.species.deltapidgeot.name: Pidgeot
cobblemon.species.deltapidgeot.desc: A living creature that looks directly into this Pokémon's eyes will be turned to stone. It breaks off very small pieces of its victims to help digest food.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltapidgeot.name: DeltaPidgeot
cobblemon.species.deltapikachu.name: Pikachu
cobblemon.species.deltapikachu.desc: When preparing for lift-off, it winds up its tail dozens of times. When it releases its tail, it experiences a tremendous burst of speed and soars into the air.
cobblemon.species.deltaraichu.name: Raichu
cobblemon.species.deltaraichu.desc: Flying at high speeds have led to it losing most of its hair. Despite gaining weight due to its obsession with pancakes, it darts around in the air faster than a jet.
cobblemon.species.deltadiglett.name: Diglett
cobblemon.species.deltadiglett.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zazulitao. As it prefers to create tunnels within the snow, it is common for explorers to fall into the holes that it creates.
cobblemon.species.deltadugtrio.name: Dugtrio
cobblemon.species.deltadugtrio.desc: Since the triplets think exactly alike, they can work together to avoid producing avalanches. This no longer applies when one of them falls asleep.
cobblemon.species.deltagrowlithe.name: Growlithe
cobblemon.species.deltagrowlithe.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. They are fiercely loyal to reputable trainers and those of high status.
cobblemon.species.deltaarcanine.name: Arcanine
cobblemon.species.deltaarcanine.desc: If placed in front of castles or temples, this Pokémon will watch the entrance without moving. Its strength is determined by its claws, teeth, and eyes.
cobblemon.species.deltatentacool.name: Tentacool
cobblemon.species.deltatentacool.desc: A Delta Species discovered by xxxHexxxx. Foes grabbed by its tentacles are slowly drained of their strength while succumbing to its poison.
cobblemon.species.deltatentacruel.name: Tentacruel
cobblemon.species.deltatentacruel.desc: It is seldom seen except when disposing of the remains of carcasses. The sacs on its head produce more poison when it senses a foe nearby.
cobblemon.species.deltageodude.name: Geodude
cobblemon.species.deltageodude.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. They are easily mistaken for parts of ruins and may surprise travelers attempting to use them for a bench.
cobblemon.species.deltagraveler.name: Graveler
cobblemon.species.deltagraveler.desc: They station themselves among ruins and act as guardians. Despite rarely moving, they quickly rush across the ground to drive away intruders who bring ill will.
cobblemon.species.deltagolem.name: Golem
cobblemon.species.deltagolem.desc: Despite possessing no discernible organs, it moves with both a mind and will of its own. It can sense trespassers from the heart of its living space.
cobblemon.species.deltadoduo.name: Doduo
cobblemon.species.deltadoduo.desc: A Delta Species discovered by TheTurtleScream. Though it possesses two independent brains, one brain will always inevitably usurp control over the other.
cobblemon.species.deltadodrio.name: Dodrio
cobblemon.species.deltadodrio.desc: Even while aware of mind control, the three heads are cooperative with one another. As one head falls asleep, another awakens and becomes the manipulator.
cobblemon.species.deltagrimer.name: Grimer
cobblemon.species.deltagrimer.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. With sand absorbed into its circulation, it can vanish into surrounding sand to escape from predators.
cobblemon.species.deltamuk.name: Muk
cobblemon.species.deltamuk.desc: It puts anything it finds in its massive mouth and hunts smaller Pokémon as prey. It tracks sand everywhere it goes, making it tedious to care for indoors.
cobblemon.species.deltakoffing.name: Koffing
cobblemon.species.deltakoffing.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. It discharges electricity when hit physically. It uses this as a defensive mechanism against predators.
cobblemon.species.deltaweezing.name: Weezing
cobblemon.species.deltaweezing.desc: The sound it makes when dispensing electricity has been compared to a lightning bolt striking nearby.
cobblemon.species.deltatangela.name: Tangela
cobblemon.species.deltatangela.desc: A Delta Species discovered by winkright. It lures prey towards its home in the earth before grabbing and pinning them.
cobblemon.species.deltascyther.name: Scyther
cobblemon.species.deltascyther.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. Its scythes are immensely sharp but also very fragile, and can easily be shattered when hit from the side.
cobblemon.species.deltaelectabuzz.name: Electabuzz
cobblemon.species.deltaelectabuzz.desc: After midnight they can be seen congregating on rooftops. However, they always make sure to return to their original positions before morning.
cobblemon.species.deltamagmar.name: Magmar
cobblemon.species.deltamagmar.desc: It can now breath underwater using the oxygen in the tank on its back. It returns to the surface once per week in order to refuel.
cobblemon.species.deltaditto.name: Ditto
cobblemon.species.deltaditto.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. When rearranging its cell structure to transform itself, it sometimes makes a mistake and becomes a different type.
cobblemon.species.deltakabuto.name: Kabuto
cobblemon.species.deltakabuto.desc: A Delta Species discovered by PokeNerd123. Though they buzz harmlessly when alone, a swarm can decimate a city's worth of crops within minutes.
cobblemon.species.deltakabutops.name: Kabutops
cobblemon.species.deltakabutops.desc: This Pokémon's changes during evolution led to it becoming a carnivore instead of an herbivore. It hovers above trees in search of prey.
cobblemon.species.deltasnorlax.name: Snorlax
cobblemon.species.deltasnorlax.desc: Trees and plants tend to grow on this Pokémons back because it moves so little. It loves eating food while playing with tiny Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltadratini.name: Dratini
cobblemon.species.deltadratini.desc: A Delta Species discovered by PokeNerd123. Because its body constantly releases electrical energy, it prefers to hide within the depths of the ocean.
cobblemon.species.deltadragonair.name: Dragonair
cobblemon.species.deltadragonair.desc: Having better control over its power, it can sometimes be seen peeking above the ocean surface. If it sneezes, it looses a massive discharge of electricity.
cobblemon.species.deltadragonite.name: Dragonite
cobblemon.species.deltadragonite.desc: A courageous and kind Pokémon, it braves storms to lead shipwrecked crews to land. It can travel underwater at a speed of 400 knots.
cobblemon.species.pikachuxfemale.name: Pikachu
cobblemon.species.pikachuxfemale.desc: It is a real anomaly between X Pokémon. Its nature makes it friendly even to human.
cobblemon.species.pikachuxmale.name: Pikachu
cobblemon.species.pikachuxmale.desc: It is a real anomaly between X Pokémon. Its nature makes it friendly even to human.
cobblemon.species.raichux.name: Raichu
cobblemon.species.raichux.desc: Gym Leader Surge's faithful companion, it has been brought back to life after a terrible accident. It is as fast as fragile.
cobblemon.species.eldiwanmeowth.name: Meowth
cobblemon.species.eldiwanmeowth.desc: Due to its delicate fur and its psychic powers, even veteran Trainers find it difficult to raise this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.ponytax.name: Ponyta
cobblemon.species.ponytax.desc: A thick cloud mane makes it float in the air. It is still a green baby, so it can only clumsily fly around.
cobblemon.species.rapidashx.name: Rapidash
cobblemon.species.rapidashx.desc: A peaceful tempered X Pokémon. However, if it gets furious, it wraps itself in thunderclouds and triggers raging lightning storms.
cobblemon.species.storm_rapidashx.name: RapidashX
cobblemon.species.storm_rapidashx.desc1: A peaceful tempered X Pokémon. However, if it gets furious, it wraps itself in thunderclouds and triggers raging lightning storms.
cobblemon.species.gastlyx.name: Gastly
cobblemon.species.gastlyx.desc: Compressed by an enormous pressure, it body is protected by a shell as hard as steel. Nobody knows how it looks inside this shell.
cobblemon.species.haunterx.name: Haunter
cobblemon.species.haunterx.desc: It catches even the most elusive preys with its claws. It tortures them and once it's had enough, it lets them go.
cobblemon.species.gengarx.name: Gengar
cobblemon.species.gengarx.desc: Because its intelligence is exceptional, Gengar can communicate with any form of life. However, it uses this gift for not-so-ethical purposes.
cobblemon.species.electabuzzx.name: Electabuzz
cobblemon.species.electabuzzx.desc: Bumping its fists together, it creates strong explosions. It will discharge its fury around when enraged.
cobblemon.species.dittox.name: Ditto
cobblemon.species.dittox.desc: Following a great number of experiments, it became extremely unstable, but it developed the ability to Transform even without seeing its target.
cobblemon.species.mewtwox.name: Mewtwo
cobblemon.species.mewtwox.desc: It has been further genetically modified by Team Dimension. Its psychic powers are frightening.
cobblemon.species.seviiandoduo.name: Doduo
cobblemon.species.seviiandodrio.name: Dodrio
cobblemon.species.hoennianvenonat.name: Venonat
cobblemon.species.hoennianvenonat.desc: Timid by nature, the wild Venonat in Hoenn prefer to live in damp, dark places. Their large, glowing eyes can see clearly even in total blackness.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantentacool.name: Tentacool
cobblemon.species.hoenniantentacool.desc: It's body is almost entirely composed of water. It grasps it's foes with it's four long tentacles, then brutally shocks it until it falls unconscious.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantentacruel.des: Despite being smaller than Tentacruel in other regions, this variant is far more aggressive, It can administer deadly jolts of electricity when aggravated.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandodrio.name: Dodrio
cobblemon.species.hoenniandodrio.desc: Its middle head dominates the other two, issuing orders as it sees fit. They often travel alongside wild Marowak when hunting for prey.
cobblemon.species.hoennianseel.name: Seel
cobblemon.species.hoennianseel.desc: Seel hunt for prey in the warm, temperate seas of Hoenn. When threatened, they curl their tailfin into a fist-like ball that can deliver crushing blows.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandewgong.name: Dewgong
cobblemon.species.hoenniandewgong.desc: It's lackadaisical nature often tricks unsuspecting trainers into believing it to be friendly. A swift strike from it's tail-fin teaches them otherwise.
cobblemon.species.hoennianonix.name: Onix
cobblemon.species.hoennianonix.desc: There is a cave in a far-away region where this Pokemon is said to have originated from. They migrated to Hoenn when the waters in their homeland grew too warm.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangela.name: Tangela
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangela.desc: It's body is covered in pointy, dead vines that it collects at a young age. If anyone attempts to peer into it's nest to view it's real body, it becomes highly aggressive.
cobblemon.species.hoennianpinsir.name: Pinsir
cobblemon.species.hoennianpinsir.desc: It grips its prey in its pincers and crushes the life out of them. It can't move if it's cold, so it prefers to inhabit warm, dry places.
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgey.name: Pidgey
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgey.desc: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgeotto.desc: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgeot.name: Pidgeot
cobblemon.species.mythianpidgeot.desc: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
cobblemon.species.mythianscyther.name: Scyther
cobblemon.species.mythianscyther.desc: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
cobblemon.species.mythianlapras.name: Lapras
cobblemon.species.mythianlapras.desc: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.
cobblemon.species.alteranekans.name: Ekans
cobblemon.species.alteranekans.desc: Alteran EKANS wrestle their prey rather than use venom. When faced with tougher foes, it wraps its body into a wheel shape and rolls away at high speed.
cobblemon.species.alteranarbok.name: Arbok
cobblemon.species.alteranarbok.desc: Alteran ARBOK has developed a longer tail compared to its Kantonian form, allowing it to wrangle prey with ease or let loose a flurry of powerful whips.
cobblemon.species.alterannidoranwinterco: AAn old lineage of NIDORAN. The males and females look alike, but come in two distinct coats. This form lives out in areas blanketed by snow.
cobblemon.species.alterannidoransummerco: An old lineage of NIDORAN. The males and females look alike, but come in two distinct coats. Its dark coat blends in with dry, rugged terrain.
cobblemon.species.armirangrowlithe.name: Growlithe
cobblemon.species.armirangrowlithe.desc: Growlithe adapted extremely quickly to its new environment thanks to its excellent sense of smell.
cobblemon.species.armiranarcanine.name: Arcanine
cobblemon.species.armiranarcanine.desc: This fleet-footed Pokémon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. Supposedly, it can also run on water.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianbulbasaur.desc: From birth, a sticky paste that it produces forms peculiar patterns on its body. Every Bulbasaur has a slightly different formation.
cobblemon.species.ayreianivysaur.name: Ivysaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianivysaur.desc: It burrows itself in sand, then waits for a prey to get closer, which is then showered by a substance similar to glue, blocking its escape.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenusaur.name: Venusaur
cobblemon.species.ayreianvenusaur.desc: The clay-like substance it secretes is used as a super glue to patch up its den. It carries other Bulbasaur and Ivysaur in its vase.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmander.name: Charmander
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmander.desc: The shiny gem on its chest is the very lifeforce of the Pokemon. In the past, poaching severely reduced this Pokemon's population.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmeleon.name: Charmeleon
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharmeleon.desc: Very impatient for its evolution, it feeds on the purest gems in the caves it lives in. While docile, it is quick to anger.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharizard.name: Charizard
cobblemon.species.ayreiancharizard.desc: Usually docile, it becomes incredibly aggressive during mating season. The hand-like appendages on its back allow it to excavate dens inside sturdy gems.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansquirtle.name: Squirtle
cobblemon.species.ayreiansquirtle.desc: While underdeveloped, its tail has enough power to smash aside large boulders.
cobblemon.species.ayreianwartortle.name: Wartortle
cobblemon.species.ayreianwartortle.desc: It takes great care of its golden horns, symbol of its pride. The shinier those horns are, the more respect a Wartortle gets in its colony.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblastoise.name: Blastoise
cobblemon.species.ayreianblastoise.desc: It uses its tail as a swinging mace, blowing away anything that comes too close. It then delivers the final blow with its prized horns.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancaterpie.name: Caterpie
cobblemon.species.ayreiancaterpie.desc: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmetapod.name: Metapod
cobblemon.species.ayreianmetapod.desc: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbutterfree.name: Butterfree
cobblemon.species.ayreianbutterfree.desc: It uses its wings to stun it's prey for an easy catch.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgey.name: Pidgey
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgey.desc: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeotto.desc: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeot.name: Pidgeot
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidgeot.desc: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandiglett.name: Diglett
cobblemon.species.ayreiandiglett.desc: It sits in one location, only bothering those who try to pass directly through it.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandugtrio.name: Dugtrio
cobblemon.species.ayreiandugtrio.desc: It sits in one location, only bothering those who try to pass directly through it.
cobblemon.species.ayreianabra.name: Abra
cobblemon.species.ayreianabra.desc: It meditates 18 hours a day to sharpen its senses. That said, they aren't very skilled.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankadabra.name: Kadabra
cobblemon.species.ayreiankadabra.desc: More active than its previous form, it stimulates its muscles by running up and down the mountains it lives in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianalakazam.name: Alakazam
cobblemon.species.ayreianalakazam.desc: Quicker than it looks, it hides in the shade waiting for the perfect moment to strike. Its high intelligence allows it to remember every fighting style.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmagnemite.name: Magnemite
cobblemon.species.ayreianmagnemite.desc: At times, Magnemite runs out of fuel and ends up on the ground. If you give coal to a grounded Magnemite, it'll start moving again.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmagneton.name: Magneton
cobblemon.species.ayreianmagneton.desc: The two heads that aren't constantly burning are always trying to detatch themselves from the third head, with little result.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrimer.name: Grimer
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrimer.desc: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmuk.name: Muk
cobblemon.species.ayreianmuk.desc: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangastly.name: Gastly
cobblemon.species.ayreiangastly.desc: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaunter.name: Haunter
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaunter.desc: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangengar.name: Gengar
cobblemon.species.ayreiangengar.desc: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar's doing.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvoltorb.name: Voltorb
cobblemon.species.ayreianvoltorb.desc: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.
cobblemon.species.ayreianelectrode.name: Electrode
cobblemon.species.ayreianelectrode.desc: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpinsir.name: Pinsir
cobblemon.species.ayreianpinsir.desc: Its powerful carapace, harder than diamond, lets it shake off even tank shells. The leader of the pack has the most scars on its iron mantle.
cobblemon.species.relictentacool.name: Tentacool
cobblemon.species.relictentacool.desc: Relic Tentacool's Source of power is the orb it holds in its tentacles. It is incredibly vulnerable without the orb, so it will defend it with its life.
cobblemon.species.relictentacruel.name: Tentacruel
cobblemon.species.relictentacruel.desc: Exposed to Ho-Ohs ashes, its brain grew and reshaped its head, causing it to resemble a steepled hat. It magnifies its power with an orb plucked from a Staryu.
cobblemon.species.relickoffing.name: Koffing
cobblemon.species.relickoffing.desc: After being touched by Ho-Oh's ashes Koffing used the gas inside itself to become a combustion engine. The gas inside its body is reportedly similar to rocket fuel.
cobblemon.species.relicweezing.name: Weezing
cobblemon.species.relicweezing.desc: Supposedly, Relic Weezing have the explosive force of a thermobaric bomb. However, being planted to the ground, it finds catching prey difficult.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianraticate.name: Raticate
cobblemon.species.kaskadianraticate.desc: Known for invading towns, ice type moves were once used against them to scare them away. Over the generations it has adapted to these icy conditions.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbellsprout.de: Bellsprout's tiny, flexible body allows it to bend and sway to dodge any assault, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon discharges a corrosive fluid that melts even iron from its mouth.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangastly.name: Gastly
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangastly.desc: After migrating to Kaskade, Gastly were cleansed of their deadly poisons by the fresh air. Their bodies then latched on to water vapor to give them physical forms.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianhaunter.name: Haunter
cobblemon.species.kaskadianhaunter.desc: Kaskadian Haunter like to play many games on other pokemon, often using its cold wet tongue to lick berries they were going to eat.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangengar.name: Gengar
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangengar.desc: Kaskadian Gengar are very hard to train, choosing to do their own thing rather than listen to their trainer. Anyone wanting to train a Gengar must be able to put up with its cruel jokes.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianjynx.name: Jynx
cobblemon.species.kaskadianlapras.name: Lapras
cobblemon.species.mysticvoltorb.name: Voltorb
cobblemon.species.mysticelectrode.name: Electrode
cobblemon.species.mysticelectrode.desc: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
cobblemon.species.cefiranvenomoth.name: Venomoth
cobblemon.species.cefiranvenomoth.desc: Venomoth are nocturnal--they only are active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
cobblemon.species.cefirandiglett.name: Diglett
cobblemon.species.cefirandugtrio.name: Dugtrio
cobblemon.species.cefiranmeowthfire.name: Meowth
cobblemon.species.cefiranmeowthfire.desc: Due to its delicate fur and its psychic powers, even veteran Trainers find it difficult to raise this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.cefiranpersianfire.des: A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
cobblemon.species.cefiranmeowthice.name: Meowth
cobblemon.species.cefiranmeowthice.desc: Due to its delicate fur and its psychic powers, even veteran Trainers find it difficult to raise this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.cefiranpersianice.name: Persian
cobblemon.species.cefiranpersianice.desc: A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
Due to its delicate fur and its psychic powers, even veteran Trainers find it difficult to raise this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.cefiranpersianelectric: A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
cobblemon.species.eghochikorita.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.eghochikorita.desc: Chikorita's thick, spiky exterior protects it from most predators. The tips of the spikes are coated in a sweet and sticky substance that humans love, but repulses most Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.eghobayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.eghobayleef.desc: The red part of Bayleef is leathery hard, where the white bottom half of Bayleef is quite soft. Being vulnerable here requires Bayleef to be constantly vigilant of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.eghomeganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.eghomeganium.desc: The black dots scattered around the white portion of Meganium are seeds. They get scattered around when it battles, eventually leading to the growth of fruit-bearing trees.
cobblemon.species.eghocyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.eghocyndaquil.desc: Cyndaquil is always producing a small cloud of volcanic ash, which is electrically charged. It can be tough to handle for new trainers.
cobblemon.species.eghoquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.eghoquilava.desc: As Quilava gets stronger, it is able to better control its volcanic ash cloud. It has learned to store and use the electricity generated by the cloud.
cobblemon.species.eghotyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.eghotyphlosion.desc: Typhlosion is very dangerous to be around if it is not in a good mood. The energy that is generated from the heat and electricity matches that of a nuclear reactor.
cobblemon.species.eghototodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.eghototodile.desc: The saliva in Totodile's mouth is corrosive to most materials. That, combined with its strong jaw, allows it to eat almost anything it gets its mouth on.
cobblemon.species.eghocroconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.eghocroconaw.desc: Croconaw's hunched stance appears to be an adaptation to aid it in traversing cramped sewer tunnels. Rattata and Grimer are not safe in the territory of this species.
cobblemon.species.eghoferaligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.eghoferaligatr.desc: This form of Feraligatr thrives in the dark murky waters of swamps and sewers. These Pokémon can cause problems in sewers because their strong jaws can rip through pipes with ease.
cobblemon.species.eghohoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.eghohoothoot.desc: The crescent on its head glows brightest when the moon is full. It can confuse prey by convincing them that the moon is coming right at them when it's really just bird.
cobblemon.species.eghonoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.eghonoctowl.desc: Noctowl use the crest on its head to reflect light into the eyes of its prey. On moonless nights, one may mistake the crest as the actual moon.
cobblemon.species.eghomarill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.eghomarill.desc: It uses its tail to swing around the rock end with ease. When not in combat, it uses the rock as a perch to see above tall grass and watch for enemies.
cobblemon.species.eghoazumarill.name: Azumarill
cobblemon.species.eghoazumarill.desc: In battle, Azumarill uses its tail as a flail or war hammer, swinging and smashing it into opponents. Outside of battle, it swings its tail fancily to attract a worthy partner.
cobblemon.species.eghoblissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.eghoblissey.desc: Because of the strong bond with their trainer, Blissey will do anything in its power to keep the trainer safe. Blissey are often considered too overbearing.
cobblemon.species.deltacyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.deltacyndaquil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. When placed in darkness, it will automatically generate more and more electricity from its tesla coil.
cobblemon.species.deltaquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.deltaquilava.desc: Its DNA continuously changes and reconstructs its body into a machine. As it becomes more dependent on electricity, it makes its home in power plants.
cobblemon.species.deltatyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.deltatyphlosion.desc: On stormy nights it ventures outdoors and pulsates in response to lightning strikes. When calm, it can induce macroshock in humans from 100 feet away.
cobblemon.species.deltahoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.deltahoothoot.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. Its ears are sensitive enough to hear a snowflake fall upon the snow on the ground from across the forest.
cobblemon.species.deltanoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.deltanoctowl.desc: Rather than flee from physical attacks, at times it will stare down the opponent's attack head on, startling them, and then freezing them to the bone.
cobblemon.species.deltachinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.deltachinchou.desc: A Delta Species discovered by CommanderPhoenix. When it senses danger, it emits bright flames and fades into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.deltalanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.deltalanturn.desc: The flames it produces are extraordinarily hot. Due to its reclusive nature, lost travelers that stumble upon it may mistake its presence for the gateway to hell.
cobblemon.species.deltapichu.name: Pichu
cobblemon.species.deltapichu.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. As it is still inept at flying, it practices gliding from high altitudes at incredible speed.
cobblemon.species.deltaaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.deltaaipom.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SixteenDraws and EchoTheThird. It sneakily places the end of its tail on people's shoulders, making others wonder if they saw a white hand.
cobblemon.species.deltasunkern.name: Sunkern
cobblemon.species.deltasunkern.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit and EchoTheThird. It is able to emit a purple fire that poisons its enemies.
cobblemon.species.deltasunflora.name: Sunflora
cobblemon.species.deltasunflora.desc: Sunflora convert fire and poison into nutrition. It purges its enemy's uncleanliness with fire.
cobblemon.species.deltayanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.deltayanma.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SapphirePhoenix. Though it specializes in camouflage, it is also a great flier capable of quickly chasing down lured prey.
cobblemon.species.deltawooper.name: Wooper
cobblemon.species.deltawooper.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. This mischievous Pokémon likes to surprise people on Halloween with tons of candy.
cobblemon.species.deltaquagsire.name: Quagsire
cobblemon.species.deltaquagsire.desc: Despite its appearance, this Delta Species is kind to every Pokémon it meets. It glows with Halloween spirit.
cobblemon.species.deltamisdreavus.name: Misdreavus
cobblemon.species.deltamisdreavus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. This Pokémon does its best to bring everyone into the holiday spirit. It's only happy when everyone else is.
cobblemon.species.deltagirafarig.name: Girafarig
cobblemon.species.deltagirafarig.desc: A Delta Species discovered by nico. The tail's insults temper the Pokémon's iron will, becoming stronger as the Pokémon grows.
cobblemon.species.deltadunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.deltadunsparce.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. Despite having a menacing appearance, it is quite friendly and skates across ponds' surfaces.
cobblemon.species.deltascizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.deltascizor.desc: Its exoskeleton is coated with a thick layer of ice. The layer of ice reforms once per year.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltascizor.name: DeltaScizor
cobblemon.species.deltashuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.deltashuckle.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zazulitao. Every punch that it takes causes its crank to turn; when its limit is reached, it bashes into foes with its head.
cobblemon.species.deltaremoraid.name: Remoraid
cobblemon.species.deltaremoraid.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Missingo_OP. The farther it goes away from pools of lava, the more rapidly the magma on its head cools down and hardens.
cobblemon.species.deltaoctillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.deltaoctillery.desc: It hides its tentacles behind its beard-like smokescreen and attacks without warning. Against stronger foes, it will grab them and submerge them in lava.
cobblemon.species.deltaelekid.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.deltaelekid.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. Though it tries to remain as still as possible around humans, it cannot withstand heavy rain, causing it to flee indoors.
cobblemon.species.deltamagby.name: Magby
cobblemon.species.deltamagby.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. Though it is a Water-type Pokémon, it is incapable of breathing underwater and aims to hold its breath longer everyday.
cobblemon.species.unownearth.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.unownearth.desc: Their appearance resembles the symbol in Dragalisk's mouth, which is why the Cardinals have considered them profane since time immemorial.
cobblemon.species.unownxenoverse.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.unownxenoverse.desc: For centuries they have been considered sacred as their appearance resembles the symbol on the Luxflon's gem.
cobblemon.species.smearglex.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.smearglex.desc: It produces a delicious low-calory cream, but it becomes rancid if not kept cool.
cobblemon.species.elekidx.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.elekidx.desc: The sparks it scatters from its head can easily cause fires or explosions. It is a real ticking bomb!
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.desc: The Tyranitar owned by Dimension General Victor. It generates a defeaning buzz by vibrating its wings.
cobblemon.species.hoennianchinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.hoennianchinchou.desc: It lives in depth beyond sunlight's reach, waiting patiently for prey to swim by. The lights on its antennae can cause intense hallucinations.
cobblemon.species.hoennianlanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.hoennianlanturn.desc: The light-emitting flame on its head is used to lure in unsuspecting prey on the seafloor. It ensnares its victims within its body and siphons their life force.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.hoenniandunsparce.desc: This Pokemon's eyesight is so poor that it can barely see objects directly in front of it. It escapes predators by shocking them with its electric tail.
cobblemon.species.hoennianqwilfish.name: Qwilfish
cobblemon.species.hoennianqwilfish.desc: Qwilfish latch their tails to rocks on the seafloor and wait for unsuspecting prey to swim by. When it spots a target, it unleashes an explosion of toxic fumes.
cobblemon.species.hoennianshuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.hoennianshuckle.desc: A Shuckle hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become juice.
cobblemon.species.hoennianteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.hoennianteddiursa.desc: It's palms constantly give off a warm glow. When in distress, the heat from it's palms can become so intense that they burn through even solid metal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.hoennianursaring.desc: Ursaring gather food from trees using their lengthy, extendable tongues. It's fearsome claws are actually intended to aid in peeling hard-skinned fruits.
cobblemon.species.hoennianskarmory.name: Skarmory
cobblemon.species.hoennianskarmory.desc: A Pokemon that has a body and wings of molten steel. In the heat of battle, the blades on its wings glow white-hot and emit clouds of burning steam.
cobblemon.species.seviianteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.seviianursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.seviianmantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.mythianmareep.name: Mareep
cobblemon.species.mythianmareep.desc: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.
cobblemon.species.mythianflaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.mythianflaaffy.desc: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
cobblemon.species.mythianampharos.name: Ampharos
cobblemon.species.mythianampharos.desc: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
cobblemon.species.mythianscizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.mythianscizor.desc: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.
cobblemon.species.alteranledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.alteranledian.desc: LEDIAN in Altera display unique patterns and behavior. It recklessly charges into battle, channeling star energy into its kicks and punches.
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.desc: A Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in volcanic areas seeking new opponents to fight.
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.desc: Said to have gone extinct shortly after the war, a few specimen have been found in the natural caves of Citrine Jungle.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.desc: The many buds decorating this Pokemon's neck are a fashion icon in a faraway region. Records found after the war imply that this Pokemon may have originated from that land.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.desc: These incredibly rare Pokemon form natural shrines in the secluded jungles they live in, adorning them with the pink leaves of its tail.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.desc: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the Pokémon is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.desc: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.desc: In the wild, humans are highly advised to stay clear of these Pokemon. They hunt other predators and take their skull upon victory.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.desc: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.desc: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.desc: This Pokemon lives to fight, it does not hold personal grudges, it just wants to destroy everything in its path.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoothoot.desc: Friendlier and more intelligent compared to its extinct counterpart. It waves to humans and other Pokemon, hoping to study their reaction.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoctowl.desc: Noctowl's already complex mind was stressed and experimented on hoping to create a Pokemon that could solve problems humans couldn't.
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.name: Spinarak
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.name: Ariados
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.name: Stantler
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.desc: The flames that burn on it's back are similar to Ponyta's, in the sense that they wont burn you if it trusts you.
cobblemon.species.relicledyba.name: Ledyba
cobblemon.species.relicledyba.desc: Relic Ledyba are often seen training with a Relic Ledian counterpart. It is said that they form close bonds with their mentors, and gift them with tarts made of Combee honey to gain favour.
cobblemon.species.relicledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.relicledian.desc: In exchange for their ability to fly, Ledian were gifted steel armor to battle along side their human comrades. Relic Ledian seem to have a strong sense of justice and protect those weaker than themselves.
cobblemon.species.relicaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.relicaipom.desc: Relic Aipom are known for their throwing skills. Trees, and occasionally an unfortunate Trevenant, are their usual targets for practice.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianmarill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.kaskadianmarill.desc: Unlike its Johto counterpart, Kaskadian Marill live underwater and use their algae like hair to absorb sunlight for energy. They are kind and gentle creatures.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianazumarill.des: The little orbs on its head are filled with oxygen and they contract when Azumarill dive underwater, then expand quickly to allow it to rise.
cobblemon.species.amazeallsudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.kaskadianyanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.cefiranteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.cefiranteddiursa.desc: It licks its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. A Teddiursa makes its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.
cobblemon.species.cefiranursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.cefiranursaring.desc: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an Ursaring gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.
cobblemon.species.cefiranslugma.name: Slugma
cobblemon.species.cefiranmagcargo.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.cefirandelibird.name: Delibird
cobblemon.species.cefiransmeargle.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.egholotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.egholotad.desc: Lotad were used to carry ingredients for chefs many years ago, eventually adapting to serve other purposes in the kitchen. Lotad is a naturally occurring stove top.
cobblemon.species.egholombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.egholombre.desc: The flat surface on top of its head sits at a constant 350 degrees Fahrenheit, making it perfect for frying almost any dish a chef could dream up.
cobblemon.species.egholudicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.egholudicolo.desc: Anything cooked atop its head gains a unique flavor, which is different for each individual Ludicolo. Some restaurants main attraction is a specific Ludicolo flavoring.
cobblemon.species.eghoazurill.name: Azurill
cobblemon.species.eghoazurill.desc: At birth, the tip of Azurill's tail holds a pebble no larger than a grain of sand. Over time, the pebble grows into a rock too large for Azurill to carry, forcing it to evolve.
cobblemon.species.eghoswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.eghoswablu.desc: Swablu tuck themselves into the cottony feathers they have to keep warm during blizzards. Flocks hum in unison as they're bundled up.
cobblemon.species.eghoaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.eghoaltaria.desc: Altaria's body is so cold that it sometimes freezes the moisture in the air around it into crystals. If you hear an Altaria's song, you can be sure a hail storm is coming.
cobblemon.species.deltatreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.deltatreecko.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SixteenDraws. It takes up residence within dojos where it trains against humans and Pokémon alike.
cobblemon.species.deltagrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.deltagrovyle.desc: As its skill grows, so does its fighting spirit. Its strength is great enough to stand on par with black belts.
cobblemon.species.deltasceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.deltasceptile.desc: After becoming a master of its dojo, it begins to regain its primal instincts. Its draconic traits cause it to have no equal within the karate world.
cobblemon.species.deltatorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.deltatorchic.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. From birth it has the ability to give orders to other wild Pokémon and have them obey without question.
cobblemon.species.deltacombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.deltacombusken.desc: It lazes about while giving its underlings commands. Its power is believed by some to have been bestowed upon it by gods of unknown origin.
cobblemon.species.deltablaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.deltablaziken.desc: It soars to amazing heights, storing power that it draws from the sun. Even when it cannot be seen from the ground below, it keeps a watchful eye on those it protects.
cobblemon.species.deltalotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.deltalotad.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Kalorian. It is known to entertain small Pokémon by performing magic tricks for them.
cobblemon.species.deltalombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.deltalombre.desc: From morning until night, it trains and practices its magic. During the evening it puts on magic shows for large crowds.
cobblemon.species.deltaludicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.deltaludicolo.desc: Its knowledge and strength make it a common source of advice for its community. It produces massive barriers to protect those important to it.
cobblemon.species.deltaseedot.name: Seedot
cobblemon.species.deltaseedot.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SketchyGamer. Its face flashes at varying frequencies depending on its mood at time.
cobblemon.species.deltanuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
cobblemon.species.deltanuzleaf.desc: Though it has a cloud around its waist, it is still too heavy to levitate. It clings to its cloud desperately whenever someone gets too close to it.
cobblemon.species.deltashiftry.name: Shiftry
cobblemon.species.deltashiftry.desc: It is said to appear suddenly during thunderstorms. When it needs to feed, it will insert its arms into electrical outlets.
cobblemon.species.deltaralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.deltaralts.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird and Zero_Breaker. It uses its own ice and electricity to help make its trainer's life easier.
cobblemon.species.deltakirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.deltakirlia.desc: This Pokémon loves dancing to swing music. As it grows more excited from dancing, it generates sparks and snow begins to fall within the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.deltagardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.deltagardevoir.desc: To protect its trainer, it can drop the temperature of itself and its surroundings to 0°K. It discharges sparks when nuzzling trainers to keep them from freezing.
cobblemon.species.deltasableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.deltasableye.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SketchyGamer. It digs deep holes into the earth in search of charcoal and molten rocks, which it uses for food.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltasableye.name: DeltaSableye
cobblemon.species.deltamawile.name: Mawile
cobblemon.species.deltamawile.desc: A Delta Species discovered by spimission. Luring foes with its innocence and sweet appearance, it devours them and sends nutrients through the vines on its head.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltamawile.name: DeltaMawile
cobblemon.species.deltaaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.deltaaron.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Draexzhan. Cracks in its armor allow more and more flames to escape as it takes damage.
cobblemon.species.deltalairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.deltalairon.desc: A territorial Pokémon that defends its land by releasing bursts of flames from within its armor. Deafening explosions can be heard when it collides with objects.
cobblemon.species.deltaaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.deltaaggron.desc: It aggressively pursues stronger opponents each and every day. The gouges in its armor generate more flames and allow it to boast more of its strength.
cobblemon.species.deltameditite.name: Meditite
cobblemon.species.deltameditite.desc: A Delta Species discovered by ensentiumseraph. Its powerful, goat-like legs allow it to scale steep mountain walls with little to no difficulty.
cobblemon.species.deltamedicham.name: Medicham
cobblemon.species.deltamedicham.desc: A deep love for nature runs through this Pokémon's veins. It will immediately begin dancing to music featuring pipes or cymbals.
cobblemon.species.deltaplusle.name: Plusle
cobblemon.species.deltaplusle.desc: A Delta Species discovered by powerpow. It is cheerful and warms up its friends using its fiery power.
cobblemon.species.deltaminun.name: Minun
cobblemon.species.deltaminun.desc: A Delta Species discovered by powerpow. It is quite jovial and cools down its friends using its icy power.
cobblemon.species.deltaroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.deltaroselia.desc: This Pokémon can be found on clear nights, dancing before the moon. If discovered, it puts onlookers to sleep and flees into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.deltawailmer.name: Wailmer
cobblemon.species.deltawailmer.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. Currently, it is still unknown how this Pokémon manages to keep itself in the air despite its weight.
cobblemon.species.deltawailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.deltawailord.desc: Hail falls over the land below as this Pokémon flies. It is suspected that the phrase 'the sky is falling' originated due to its shadow blanketing the ground.
cobblemon.species.deltanumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.deltanumel.desc: A Delta Species discovered by bradleyinabox. The first of its kind was known to have appeared at the ground zero of a nuclear explosion.
cobblemon.species.deltacamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.deltacamerupt.desc: This Pokémon feeds on nuclear radiation. It has been shown that atoms within its vicinity become more and more unstable as its temper reaches its peak.
cobblemon.species.deltafeebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.deltafeebas.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. Though it desires to scare strangers, it is timid and oftentimes ends up frightening itself instead.
cobblemon.species.deltamilotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.deltamilotic.desc: It is known to lurk within graveyards. Memories from the life of its skeleton inspire it to ruthlessly protect a worthy master.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltamilotic.name: DeltaMilotic
cobblemon.species.deltasnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.deltasnorunt.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. It is said that this Pokémon helps to guard volcanoes and deep caves from intruders.
cobblemon.species.deltaglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.deltaglalie.desc: This Pokémon has the power to evaporate entire oceans with a single breath.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltaglalie.name: DeltaGlalie
cobblemon.species.deltaclamperl.name: Clamperl
cobblemon.species.deltaclamperl.desc: A Delta Species discovered by yungbro. It catches prey in its jaws by pretending to be an unassuming shellfish.
cobblemon.species.deltahuntail.name: Huntail
cobblemon.species.deltahuntail.desc: A savage creature which prefers to live in solitude within dark caves. If another organism ventures into its domain, it will assault them relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.deltagorebyss.name: Gorebyss
cobblemon.species.deltagorebyss.desc: A friendly creature which prefers to share its living space with other cave-dwelling Pokémon. It prefers the warmth of tropical climates.
cobblemon.species.deltaspiderbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.deltaspiderbeldum.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. It builds webs in trees, ensnaring prey, and then subdues them with its venom.
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetang.desc: The string it produces is both unnaturally thin and impossibly strong. Clothing weaved together using its silk is flexible yet stronger than titanium.
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetagross.d: Rather than resorting to capturing prey using webs, it resorts to other trickery. Foes entering its domain may see it as a tiger, a demon, or a giant spider.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.deltaruinbeldum.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk and Cowctus. It is said that beneath its rough exterior exists a crystal shard of unimaginable value.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetang.desc: As multiple altered Beldums come into contact with each other, their crystals resonate, causing their cores to fuse. They then reconstruct into a single entity.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetagross.des: After two altered Metang fuse into this Pokémon, all but the exterior of its body is composed of crystal. Additional crystals allow it to break free of its rocky shell.
cobblemon.species.deltaregirock.name: Regirock
cobblemon.species.deltaregirock.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Being made of sand, it can easily replenish itself and in some cases ward off Water-type attacks with ease.
cobblemon.species.deltaregice.name: Regice
cobblemon.species.deltaregice.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Though its entire body is composed of water, it is unable to alter its molecules into that of a gas or a solid.
cobblemon.species.deltaregisteel.name: Registeel
cobblemon.species.deltaregisteel.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Its emergence from pools of magma is said to be blinding due to its core glowing with extreme heat.
cobblemon.species.roseliax.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.roseliax.desc: Using the auricular organs on its arms, Roselia amplifies the range of its voice. It can even break rocks at full volume.
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.name: Carvanha
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.desc: It perpetually floats upside down on the surface of the water. Apparently, it doesn't feed on anything to survive.
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.name: Sharpedo
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.desc: This Pokemon may have appeared long time ago, since very ancient sailors' tales already told of a creature used to devour ships to make them its den.
cobblemon.species.cacneax.name: Cacnea
cobblemon.species.cacneax.desc: Because its appearance resembles a severed head, everyone who fights this Cacnea is scared to death.
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.name: Cacturne
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.desc: Its internal body is made of a straw-like material. It shoots its needles to cast cursed spell against enemies.
cobblemon.species.seviianfeebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.seviianmilotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.alteranshroomish.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.alteranshroomish.desc: With its striking red cap, it sticks out in its forest habitat. Because it carries such a potent toxin, predators know to leave it alone.
cobblemon.species.alteranbreloom.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.alteranbreloom.desc: Its strikes have less force behind them than its cousins from Hoenn. However, the deadly spores it delivers with each blow definitely pack a punch!
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.desc: It recides by itself, and is extremely competitive. This Pokémon disintergrates trees and plants.
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.name: Swellow
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.desc: It can induce thunderstorms to create attacks. It often targets fishing ships to steal food from netting.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.desc: Their immense ghostly energy allows them to summon additional limbs for a short time, but their inexperience makes them quite clumsy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.desc: They blend in seemlessly with the shadows, which enable an easy ambush. When ignored, they will sometimes attack their own trainer.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.desc: Wild and unpredictable, their legs kick the life out of their opponents. The floating limbs disappear if they stray too far from the main body.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.desc: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.desc: When Aron evolves, it leaves behind molten pebbles. In ancient times, people would collect Aron's shed rocks to warm themselves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon emits high amounts of steam. Close inspection of their magma armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.desc: The temperature inside Aggron's core can be compared to that of an industrial furnace. When threatened, it blows molten rock out of the pores on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.desc: It will fire rapid strikes from the toxic flowers on its hands if it feels threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.desc: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.desc: While cute and seemingly docile, it angers really quickly. They nest in areas most often hit by thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.desc: Only seen during thunderstorms, they brave the dark skies uncontested in both ferocity and boldness.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.name: Lunatone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.desc: Different types of music can be heard coming from it, depending on the mood it's in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.name: Relicanth
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.desc: Said to be an incredibly old species gone extinct, a few specimen have begun appearing near the shores of Ayrei. They look lifeless at a glance.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.name: Luvdisc
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.desc: It floats about pretending to be dead, waiting for its prey to approach before attacking.
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.desc: A warrior in training, Roselia hone their skills, becoming fearsome despite their short size. They are known for their excellent offensive and defensive capabilities.
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.name: Spinda
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.desc: By the grace of Ho-Ohs ashes, Spinda walked the wheel of life and attained enlightenment. Strategists and sages alike sought out its guidance.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.desc: It enjoys blasting Grunge music everywhere it goes. The orange patterns on its body are similar to guitar strings and ripped jeans.
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.windycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.windycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.smoggycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.smoggycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.dustycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.dustycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.

cobblemon.species.sandycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.swarmycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.swarmycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.spookycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.spookycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.whirlycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.whirlycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.allergycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.allergycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.zappycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.zappycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.zennycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.zennycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.desc: Tropius thrives in Kaskade's ever-changing weather because the ground in which it roots is rich in nutrients. They are quiet pokemon, but when furious, their roots transform into powerful weapons that can swiftly overwhelm enemies.
cobblemon.species.mystictreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.mysticgrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.desc: After becoming a master of its dojo, it begins to regain its primal instincts. Its draconic traits cause it to have no equal within the karate world.
cobblemon.species.mystictorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.mysticcombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.mysticblaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.mysticmudkip.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticmarshtomp.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticswampert.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticpoochyena.name: Poochyena
cobblemon.species.mysticmightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.cefiranmakuhita.name: Makuhita
cobblemon.species.cefiranhariyama.name: Hariyama
cobblemon.species.cefiransableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.cefirannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.cefirancamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.cefiranvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.cefiranflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.cefiransnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.cefiranglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.desc: In order to adapt to an environment of egg-stealing predators, Happiny has become hyper-aggressive and territorial. It carries an egg-shaped rock in its pouch.
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.desc: This Magnezone is a result of a sudden mutation causing one of the Magneton's bodies to absorb the other two and grow rapidly in power.
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.desc: Tangrowth has the ability to absorb and supply electricity through the prongs on the ends of its arms, enabling it to act as a sort of living battery.
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.name: Turtwig
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. Made from sand, the shell on its back hardens as it floats along the ocean's surface. As it dives, the shell softens.
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.desc: It lives along the water's surface in oceans. During the day, it dives underwater regularly to refresh the sea life taking shelter on its back.
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.desc: As it moves in the ocean continuously, pirates store their loot in its back for safekeeping. It oftentimes participates in treasure hunts for younger Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. A single scratch from it is toxic enough to faint targets as it flees into the wild.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.desc: This Pokémon's poison is potent enough to cause fainting just from standing downwind of it.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.desc: One drop of its venom is potent enough to incapacitate 2000 Rattata.
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros and EchoTheThird. It hides itself from the sun during the day and stares longingly at the moon at night.
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.desc: Its fans are capable of whipping up vicious gales. Though shy, it will become aggressive if its dance is interrupted.
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. The middle body hosts a reactor; it uses this to power up its Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.name: Vespiquen
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.desc: It hovers in the air with electromagnetic force produced from its reactor. If it doesn't consume enough food for fuel, it will be unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.desc: It plays pranks by frightening people with its detachable head. If its spirit leaves its body, its body is left without arms.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.desc: A Delta Species discovered by yungbro. It is formed by the passionate spirits of people and Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.desc: Though it is drowsy during the daytime, it flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.name: Buneary
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.desc: A Delta Species discovered by nico. It uses its techniques to rob the weak, causing its parents to scold it constantly.
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.name: Lopunny
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.desc: Having found inner peace, it fights for the future. As a parent, it never seems to be able to take its eyes off of its mischievous children.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalopunny.name: DeltaLopunny
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.desc: This Pokémon loves making snow-ghosts with humans. It has an unquenchable love for the holidays.
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Sparrows413. This Pokémon lays in the fields all day after eating, absorbing nutrients from the sun.
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. It practices sanitizing and preserving the bodies of the deceased, showing them one final form of respect.
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.desc: The afterlife and rebirth of souls are sacred to this Pokémon. It will fiercely guard any tomb or cemetery that it comes across from graverobbers.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalucario.name: DeltaLucario
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.name: Croagunk
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.desc: A Delta Species discovered by pokefan1241. Its cheeks hold large amounts of fire. It generates thick smog to sneak up behind its opponents and attack them.
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.name: Toxicroak
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.desc: Its knuckles generate flames so intense that they can be used as fiery knives. Stabbing with these flames can easily melt holes in steel.
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.desc: A vicious Pokémon which spreads its tendrils beneath the ground, ensnaring unsuspecting trespassers. It uses their cries for help to lure more prey.
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.name: Electivire
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.desc: After midnight they can be seen congregating on rooftops. However, they always make sure to return to their original positions before morning.
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.name: Magmortar
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.desc: With additional armor, this Pokémon can easily endure pressures at the bottom of the ocean. Its cannons serve as defense from lurking dangerous opponents.
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.desc: Using its wings to generate massive gusts, it blends in with surrounding foliage and tricks prey into seeking shelter beneath its leaves.
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.desc: A master swordfighter, it uses both Electric- and Ice-type attacks to defeat opponents. Over time it numbs its opponents and decreases their reaction speeds.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltagallade.name: DeltaGallade
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.desc: This Pokémon has the power to evaporate entire oceans with a single breath.
cobblemon.species.budewx.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.budewx.desc: If you put your ear to its sound organ, you will hear the sound of a soft breathing. When it's fired up, the sound becomes deafening.
cobblemon.species.roseradex.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.roseradex.desc: It waves its stings to modify any sound wave at will. If it interferes with its opponent's heartbeat, it will cause them irreparable harm.
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.name: Spiritomb
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.desc: Some theories assert that this is Spiritomb's real appearence--it's the one we already know who comes from the Xenoverse.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.desc: This Pokemon will resort to any means necessary to win in a fight. It stands upright on it's vines to appear larger and more menacing.
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.name: Regigigas
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.desc: After eons of being sealed away, all that remains of Regigigas is its skeletal structure. In its prime, this Pokemon was capable of reshaping the world.
cobblemon.species.seviiancarnivine.name: Carnivine
cobblemon.species.seviianmantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.desc: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.desc: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.desc: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.name: Hippopotas
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.desc: It enshrouds itself with water to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy being dry.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.name: Hippowdon
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.desc: It blasts internally stored water from ports on its body to create a towering whirlpool for attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.name: Shinx
