cobblemon.species.chimpoca.desc: Chimpoca, though typically naïve and clumsy, all aspire to become the leaders of their troops. Their brazen actions often lead them into trouble.
cobblemon.species.simayan.name: Simayan
cobblemon.species.simayan.desc: Simayan spend all their time sparring with each other. Their aim is to show that they are the strongest in the group, and thus become the next leader.
cobblemon.species.monkezuma.name: Monkezuma
cobblemon.species.monkezuma.desc: There can be only one Monkezuma per troop, who leads the rest with an iron fist. If another Simayan evolves, the two battle, and the loser is exiled.
cobblemon.species.enigmite.name: Enigmite
cobblemon.species.enigmite.desc: Enigmite selects a round stone and rolls it around tirelessly. When the stone becomes perfectly smooth, Enigmite gains psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.enigmantis.name: Enigmantis
cobblemon.species.enigmantis.desc: Enigmantis uses its perfectly rounded gem to focus its psychic powers. Robbing it of its stone leaves it sluggish and listless.
cobblemon.species.arjibi.name: Arjibi
cobblemon.species.arjibi.desc: Arjibi absorbs light with its colored fins to produce energy. In bright light, it flits about energetically, so fast that film barely registers it as a blur.
cobblemon.species.royjibiv.name: Royjibiv
cobblemon.species.royjibiv.desc: Royjibiv's iridescent scales reflect and amplify sunlight. When flying overhead, this causes it to bathe the ground below it in every color imaginable.
cobblemon.species.barracute.name: Barracute
cobblemon.species.barracute.desc: Barracute hides in the narrow openings between rocks to protect its soft body. It will stick its head out and bite anything unlucky enough to get near it.
cobblemon.species.jawgodon.name: Jawgodon
cobblemon.species.jawgodon.desc: Despite being a fast swimmer, Jawgodon prefers stealing others' prey and eating carrion rather than hunting. It will search on land if food is scarce.
cobblemon.species.drosire.name: Drosire
cobblemon.species.drosire.desc: Drosire cannot draw nutrients from the soil, so it uses its vines to hang from trees and catch bugs. Unaware humans may accidentally walk into it face first.
cobblemon.species.sunduke.name: Sunduke
cobblemon.species.sunduke.desc: Sunduke lead groups of Drosire in return for reverence. As such, they have long been a symbol of royalty, and ancient Urobians fashioned their regalia on them.
cobblemon.species.wispern.name: Wispern
cobblemon.species.wispern.desc: It is common to find a procession of Wispern at a funeral. It is believed that they are there to safely guide the deceased to the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.phantern.name: Phantern
cobblemon.species.phantern.desc: Phantern congregate in large groups at times of celebration. Oddly, its ghostly lights are known to appear at both festivals and funerals.
cobblemon.species.glocto.name: Glocto
cobblemon.species.glocto.desc: Gloctos molten innards form constantly shifting bubbles of glowing lava. This strange, yet beautiful phenomenon is visible from above the oceans surface.
cobblemon.species.lavoon.name: Lavoon
cobblemon.species.lavoon.desc: Lavoon releases molten secretions from its blowhole, which gradually rise to the surface and cool. People collect them to use as alternative fuel.
cobblemon.species.gilla.name: Gilla
cobblemon.species.gilla.desc: From the moment it hatches, Gilla must fend for itself. It hunts on its own, even in its infancy, using poison glands filled with toxic venom.
cobblemon.species.hornizard.name: Hornizard
cobblemon.species.hornizard.desc: Hornizards spines contain a potent venom, while its skin secretes an acidic compound. Due to these defenses, it has almost no natural predators.
cobblemon.species.ankillosore.name: Ankillosore
cobblemon.species.ankillosore.desc: Ankillosore will let attackers strike its thick hide so it can line up a blow with its tail. If the impact doesn't fell the foe, the venom surely will.
cobblemon.species.bazilisk.name: Bazilisk
cobblemon.species.bazilisk.desc: While sunbathing, Bazilisk lays in tall grass so that only its dorsal leaf is visible. When prey passes by, however, it jumps up and snaps at it quickly.
cobblemon.species.ornitherb.name: Ornitherb
cobblemon.species.ornitherb.desc: Ornitherb work together to steal eggs from other Pokémon's nests. A few will distract the parents while others make off with their target.
cobblemon.species.dilophlora.name: Dilophlora
cobblemon.species.dilophlora.desc: Dilophlora will commit every rock and plant in its jungle to memory. That way it can swiftly avoid any obstacle while chasing down its prey at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.baboom.name: Baboom
cobblemon.species.baboom.desc: Baboom is vicious towards any outsiders. It can build up an electric charge by rapidly slapping its own rear, which causes thunderous blasts of lightning.
cobblemon.species.icetope.name: Icetope
cobblemon.species.icetope.desc: Icetope's innards are in the constant danger of overheating and melting down. To counteract this, it maintains an extremely low body temperature.
cobblemon.species.chillnobyl.name: Chillnobyl
cobblemon.species.chillnobyl.desc: Chillnobyl appears near radioactive sites and absorbs the radiation there. It is often used to clean up nuclear waste and seek out leaks in nuclear reactors.
cobblemon.species.wendingo.name: Wendingo
cobblemon.species.wendingo.desc: Wendingo lives in a tight-knit pack. It uses its coloration to blend in with its snowy habitat, then cooperates with the pack to take down larger prey.
cobblemon.species.carnibal.name: Carnibal
cobblemon.species.carnibal.desc: Carnibal's ravaging hunger is never satisfied. It can't stand the thought of sharing food with others, so it leaves the pack to hunt on its own.
cobblemon.species.luchito.name: Luchito
cobblemon.species.luchito.desc: Luchito practice grabs and throws on rocks to develop their own signature move. Despite their size, their tail stores a powerful electric charge.
cobblemon.species.eluchadon.name: Eluchadon
cobblemon.species.eluchadon.desc: When Eluchadon is challenged, it holds nothing back against its foe. It builds up static energy in its mane to unleash in an electrifying finishing move.
cobblemon.species.grolem.name: Grolem
cobblemon.species.grolem.desc: Acting as a sentry for temples, Grolem forms a symbiosis with the moss and foliage it wears. Roots run through it like circuitry to deliver solar energy.
cobblemon.species.comossus.name: Comossus
cobblemon.species.comossus.desc: Comossus is theorized to have served as a sentinel for bygone civilizations. It is able to focus natural energies into powerful destructive beams.
cobblemon.species.larvyn.name: Larvyn
cobblemon.species.larvyn.desc: Larvyn's appetite is ravenous. It will eat almost anything, be it wood, rocks or even metal. It uses the nutrients to slowly develop a sturdy shell.
cobblemon.species.dracoon.name: Dracoon
cobblemon.species.dracoon.desc: Having encased itself in a rigid shell, Dracoon begins its transformation. It hardly moves at all, instead directing its entire attention to its growth.
cobblemon.species.basilect.name: Basilect
cobblemon.species.basilect.desc: Basilect uses its powerful pincers to shear and jab at foes. Opposing Basilect will grapple with their pincers and try to hurl the other as far as they can.
cobblemon.species.carbite.name: Carbite
cobblemon.species.carbite.desc: Carbite consumes minerals in excess to toughen its rocky hide. It prefers carbon, so it will occasionally go after live prey.
cobblemon.species.pressaur.name: Pressaur
cobblemon.species.pressaur.desc: Pressaur compresses the minerals it consumes, producing so much energy that it must expel heat through the vents that run along its rugged body.
cobblemon.species.diamat.name: Diamat
cobblemon.species.diamat.desc: In battle, Diamat refracts light through its glittering body to blind foes, then finishes them off with its powerful, unbreakable claws.
cobblemon.species.quecko.name: Quecko
cobblemon.species.quecko.desc: Quecko is hard to find and catch; this makes it very sought after not only by trainers, but also by healers who use its leaves to make medicine.
cobblemon.species.tozecko.name: Tozecko
cobblemon.species.tozecko.desc: Tozecko was worshipped as a god of wind and harvest in ancient times. When offered tribute, it would ensure clear skies and bountiful crops.
cobblemon.species.crakling.name: Crakling
cobblemon.species.crakling.desc: If one hears sharp explosions with no one around, it might be a Crakling, blowing up pebbles for fun. Its tail constantly shoots bright sparks.
cobblemon.species.fuelong.name: Fuelong
cobblemon.species.fuelong.desc: Fuelong idly rests in the clouds at day, but at night it awakes and breathes its colorful fire. From below, it looks like a display of brilliant fireworks.
cobblemon.species.draggar.name: Draggar
cobblemon.species.draggar.desc: Draggar looks fierce from afar, but it is in fact very jovial. It enjoys swimming through even the roughest seas, unafraid of storms or large waves.
cobblemon.species.ragnarow.name: Ragnarow
cobblemon.species.ragnarow.desc: On foggy nights, Ragnarow is often mistaken for an abandoned vessel. Sailors tell stories of the terrible shipwrecks that occur if Ragnarow is approached.
cobblemon.species.eronze.name: Eronze
cobblemon.species.eronze.desc: Eronze's body is made from an ancient metal alloy lost to modern science. It can withstand intense heat and force without the slightest bit of damage.
cobblemon.species.erion.name: Erion
cobblemon.species.erion.desc: Erion is an industrial titan, ravenously consuming fuel and spewing it out as toxic smog. Plants and Pokémon in its wake wither and gasp for air.
cobblemon.species.erace.name: Erace
cobblemon.species.erace.desc: Thought to be damaged beyond repair, Erace was retrofitted with state-of-the-art technology. Its new, advanced body can even withstand atmospheric re-entry.
cobblemon.species.patama.name: Patama
cobblemon.species.patama.desc: Patama presides over land and forests, caring for the plants and Pokémon. It perpetuates the life cycle, making sure death always brings forth new life.
cobblemon.species.machima.name: Machima
cobblemon.species.machima.desc: Machima is said to wander the badlands, shrouded in a perpetual sandstorm. In legend, it whisks intruders away from the desert on a cushion of wind.
cobblemon.species.yacuma.name: Yacuma
cobblemon.species.yacuma.desc: Seeing Yacuma's lights floating in the deep is a bad omen for sailors. Ships that pollute the sea are unlikely to escape its wrath and return to shore.
cobblemon.species.quetzar.name: Quetzar
cobblemon.species.quetzar.desc: Quetzar's wings inspired the ancient Urobians to name the constellations. Legends warn that if it leaves, the night sky will turn pitch black.
cobblemon.species.quetzarspace.name: Quetzar
cobblemon.species.quetzarspace.desc: Quetzar's wings inspired the ancient Urobians to name the constellations. Legends warn that if it leaves, the night sky will turn pitch black.
cobblemon.species.xochi.name: Xochi
cobblemon.species.xotec.name: Xotec
cobblemon.species.meadew.name: Meadew
cobblemon.species.ninfae.name: Ninfae
cobblemon.species.faeuna.name: Faeuna
cobblemon.species.mousic.name: Mousic
cobblemon.species.rabatuta.name: Rabatuta
cobblemon.species.flamelin.name: Flamelin
cobblemon.species.gulliby.name: Gulliby
cobblemon.species.saigull.name: Saigull
cobblemon.species.seaghoul.name: Seaghoul
cobblemon.species.lukpup.name: Lukpup
cobblemon.species.lukpup.desc: A shy Pokémon that only appears in perfect weather conditions. It's seen so rarely that some people aren't convinced that they're real.
cobblemon.species.lukagon.name: Lukagon
cobblemon.species.lukagon.desc: To see a Lukagon in the wild requires incredible luck. It is said that if a Lukagon rubs up against you that you will be cured of any disease you may have.
cobblemon.species.kokiseed.name: Kokiseed
cobblemon.species.kokiseed.desc: A small seed-like Pokémon that enjoys dancing at festivals. It scatters its leaves around for pizaz. It will sometimes try to imitate stronger Pokémon fighting.
cobblemon.species.kokipound.name: Kokipound
cobblemon.species.kokipound.desc: Their passion for dance transitions to martial arts. Can be found sparring on beaches. It hits palm tree trunks with its bare fists.
cobblemon.species.kokismash.name: Kokismash
cobblemon.species.kokismash.desc: These Pokémon are gentle in nature, despite their intimidating demeanor. They enjoy dancing, sparring, and lifting heavy things. They like to protect smaller friends.
cobblemon.species.chargo.name: Chargo
cobblemon.species.chargo.desc: A mountain Pokémon that is kept around villages to keep people warm. They are ditzy and must be watched around flammable things.
cobblemon.species.burnaram.name: Burnaram
cobblemon.species.burnaram.desc: The Pokémon puts on some bulk after evolving as it learns better to control its body. They can stand still for hours, meditating.
cobblemon.species.psysteed.name: Psysteed
cobblemon.species.psysteed.desc: This Pokémon helps nomadic tribes haul building material using its telekenetic powers. Humans also dye the fur with archaic symbols.
cobblemon.species.darpole.name: Darpole
cobblemon.species.darpole.desc: This Pokémon likes to play pranks on trainers who get too close to the edge of a pond, and then dive down into the water where it can't be reached.
cobblemon.species.brutoad.name: Brutoad
cobblemon.species.brutoad.desc: Brutoad are known to be aggressive and territorial, following orders from a stronger lead Pokémon. Their fins are sharp on the edges.
cobblemon.species.godfrogger.name: Godfrogger
cobblemon.species.godfrogger.desc: A lethargic Pokémon that prefers to give orders to its underlings instead of doing things itself. It tries to control wild areas, usually humid and swampy locations.
cobblemon.species.gorochu.name: Gorochu
cobblemon.species.gorochu.desc: Gorochu are competitive by nature. They use their large tails, charged with electricity, to slash at their foes. They inhabit generally hot areas.
cobblemon.species.nidorook.name: Nidorook
cobblemon.species.nidorook.desc: When a Nidorino or Nidorina evolve into Nidorook, they maintain their quadruped form. This evolutionary branch has an emphasis on speed.
cobblemon.species.quezsparce.name: Quezsparce
cobblemon.species.quezsparce.desc: It uses its jaded chin as a plow to move dirt while tunneling. The growth in its wings allows it to be a faster, and more dangerous opponent above ground.
cobblemon.species.faeralynx.name: Faeralynx
cobblemon.species.faeralynx.desc: The fur of a Faeralynx is highly sought after by the wealthy elite. They tend to spend at least 6 hours a day grooming themselves.
cobblemon.species.skulkraken.name: Skulkraken
cobblemon.species.skulkraken.desc: A metal shell encasing a vicious sea creature. Its claws can rip through the steel hull of a ship. Legend has it that a giant Skulkraken exists in the vast oceans.
cobblemon.species.oozma.name: Oozma
cobblemon.species.oozma.desc: When Muk become too hot, their bodies transition into molten lava. Oozma feed off pools of lava to continue to maintain their high body temperature.
cobblemon.species.omeon.name: Omeon
cobblemon.species.omeon.desc: Omeon have a natural connection with the spirits. The flame on the end of its tail will flicker and blow in the direction of any unseen presence.
cobblemon.species.champeon.name: Champeon
cobblemon.species.champeon.desc: Champeon are naturally competitive and will seek out bigger opponents. Can often be found in alley ways, scrapping with the fiercest scavengers.
cobblemon.species.lepideon.name: Lepideon
cobblemon.species.lepideon.desc: Lepideon are natural pollen magnets. If a loved one of Lepideon has allergies to pollen, Lepideon will collect all the pollen in the area to help relieve the irritation.
cobblemon.species.guardeon.name: Guardeon
cobblemon.species.guardeon.desc: If Eevees in a pack evolve, the combination of Guardeon and Champeon can be volatile. Guardeon have an eternal rivalry with any Champeon they meet, even if related.
cobblemon.species.obsideon.name: Obsideon
cobblemon.species.obsideon.desc: Among mountainous Pokémon, it is relatively faster. It rams its obsidian covered spine against Graveler and Onix as a way of playing around to get them to chase it.
cobblemon.species.scorpeon.name: Scorpeon
cobblemon.species.scorpeon.desc: It has been said that Scorpeon's tail has a mind of its own. Scorpeon will get its prey to focus on its face while it steadily aims its stinger for the next strike.
cobblemon.species.sphynxeon.name: Sphynxeon
cobblemon.species.sphynxeon.desc: In ancient times, Sphynxeon were treated as a divine beings sent from the heavens. Many of the designs from the royal wardrobes were inspired by Sphynxeon.
cobblemon.species.nimbeon.name: Nimbeon
cobblemon.species.nimbeon.desc: Nimbeon floats through the air, barely grazing the surface as it's used as a pushing-off point. If winds get too strong, it can blow Nimbeon away.
cobblemon.species.draconeon.name: Draconeon
cobblemon.species.draconeon.desc: Draconeon are considered exotic and are rarely seen outside of Blackthorn City in Johto. Though smaller than most dragons, Draconeon are fierce and passionate.
cobblemon.species.eeveeon.name: Eeveeon
cobblemon.species.eeveeon.desc: Eeveeon is the result of an Eevee with stable DNA. When exposed to the pure energy of an Astral Stone, Eevee is able to maintain its Normal typing during evolution.
cobblemon.species.vareon.name: Vareon
cobblemon.species.vareon.desc: Vareon is the result of an Eevee trying to adapt to overly mutated DNA. This Pokémon seems to be able to change its typing fluidly throughout battle.
cobblemon.species.terathwack.name: Terathwack
cobblemon.species.terathwack.desc: A rarely seen evolution to Marowak. The skull once worn as a Cubone has now become a natural part of the Pokémon. Can often be seen protecting wild Kangaskhan.
cobblemon.species.grimfowl.name: Grimfowl
cobblemon.species.grimfowl.desc: In ancient times, people believed Grimfowl to be the harbinger of death, sent from the underworld. Nowadays its feathers are used as funeral décor.
cobblemon.species.sunflorid.name: Sunflorid
cobblemon.species.sunflorid.desc: Sunflorid converts solar energy into nutrition and stores the excess for future use in battle. It has a tendency to singe its own hands while using Fire based attacks.
cobblemon.species.sorcerice.name: Sorcerice
cobblemon.species.sorcerice.desc: This Pokémon's elemental abilities are so powerful that it must live in isolation while maintaining constant focus to prevent itself from freezing everything around it.
cobblemon.species.kecleodon.name: Kecleodon
cobblemon.species.kecleodon.desc: Kecleodon are so good at blending in with their environments, that it was only just discovered recently that Kecleon could even evolve at all.
cobblemon.species.wereyena.name: Wereyena
cobblemon.species.wereyena.desc: In rare occasion, when Mightyena are exposed to pure moonlight, they will evolve into Wereyena. Legends said that these Pokémon were just transformed humans.
cobblemon.species.reaptide.name: Reaptide
cobblemon.species.reaptide.desc: Reaptide lurks in murky waters, searching for prey. It drags its victims deep into the water where they succumb to the high pressure, or suffocate.
cobblemon.species.kidfoot.name: Kidfoot
cobblemon.species.kidfoot.desc: Most people consider Kidfoot to be a myth, being rarely seen by the average person. Because they are so elusive, little research has been done on them.
cobblemon.species.snosquatch.name: Snosquatch
cobblemon.species.snosquatch.desc: Snosquatch can be highly aggressive and prone to fits of rage, which can become so intense that they cause avalanches. It will claim mountain tops as its territory.
cobblemon.species.grasquatch.name: Grasquatch
cobblemon.species.grasquatch.desc: Grasquatch's existence was a subject of debate for many years due to its rarity. It is seen as a peaceful guardian of any forest that it inhabits.
cobblemon.species.arctusk.name: Arctusk
cobblemon.species.arctusk.desc: It is believed that Arctusk may share a common ancestor with Phanpy, due to their similar biology. Arctusk roamed frigid environments hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.gigantusk.name: Gigantusk
cobblemon.species.gigantusk.desc: This Pokémon was revived from a specimen found frozen in an ancient glacier. It was hunted by ancient humans for its extremely durable armor.
cobblemon.species.iceros.name: Iceros
cobblemon.species.iceros.desc: At birth, Iceros lacks the strength to lift its horn off the ground. It relies on the care of its herd to survive until it becomes strong enough to move on its own.
cobblemon.species.glacieros.name: Glacieros
cobblemon.species.glacieros.desc: Glacieros shares a common ancestor with the Rhyhorn family. The horn is encased in ice, which makes up about half of the total body weight of these Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.mockroach.name: Mockroach
cobblemon.species.mockroach.desc: Mockroach can detach its head and use it as a projectile. Luckily it can survive for up to three months without its head attached, because it tends to lose it.
cobblemon.species.jollibird.name: Jollibird
cobblemon.species.jollibird.desc: Jollibird will only be in the presence of people who have been nice all year round. Given the nature of human beings, very few people have seen a Jollibird.
cobblemon.species.kablowfish.name: Kablowfish
cobblemon.species.kablowfish.desc: The inside of Kablowfish's body is so highly pressurized that just touching it can cause it to burst, releasing a large cloud of poisonous gas.
cobblemon.species.scalarva.name: Scalarva
cobblemon.species.scalarva.desc: Despite its appearance, Scalarva is actually rather docile. It relies on its sharp spikes and scales for protection, only using violence as a last resort.
cobblemon.species.dragalis.name: Dragalis
cobblemon.species.dragalis.desc: Dragalis's body is composed of solid scales over a dense layer of silk. Its true power slumbers within the innermost layer, waiting to be unleashed.
cobblemon.species.ceregal.name: Ceregal
cobblemon.species.ceregal.desc: In the distant past, it was believed that anyone capable of taming Ceregal was destined to rule. The pattern on its wings take on the face of a frightening dragon.
cobblemon.species.gargon.name: Gargon
cobblemon.species.gargon.desc: Gargon is one of the earliest discovered Dragon Pokémon, and was a symbol of the Dragon Tamer Clan in Johto. Statues of this Pokémon are scattered around the world.
cobblemon.species.wardern.name: Wardern
cobblemon.species.wardern.desc: In ancient times, there was much debate over whether Wardern's ferocity came from its desire to fight evil or it being a vessel for evil itself.
cobblemon.species.dragoyle.name: Dragoyle
cobblemon.species.dragoyle.desc: Hundreds of years ago, this Pokémon would be perched atop cathedrals and large stone architecture. It seemed to want to protect the inhabitants below.
cobblemon.species.porygonx.name: PorygonX
cobblemon.species.porygonx.desc: Porygon-X is an upgrade to Porygon, programmed by Professor Thorn. It is designed to translate quantum data between infinite realities.
cobblemon.species.oculeus.name: Oculeus
cobblemon.species.oculeus.desc: Oculeus exists as an omniscient, universal force. It uses Unown to observe life all over the universe. Once the Unown is done observing, it is absorbed into Oculeus.
cobblemon.species.arkhaos.name: Arkhaos
cobblemon.species.arkhaos.desc: Arkhaos exists in the void between dimensions, where it lays eggs that spawn Arceus with a new universe. Its rotating ring is used to create rifts in reality.
cobblemon.species.viledoom.name: Viledoom
cobblemon.species.viledoom.desc: Its rotten pollen have turned into deadly spores. Viledoom live dissacoiated from any other living beings due their spores being too dangerous for any ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.mortossum.name: Mortossum
cobblemon.species.mortossum.desc: Mortossum managed to rid its body from the poisonous spores. Despite Mortossums destructive past, its will to focus and act towards the greater good has remained.
cobblemon.species.mushling.name: Mushling
cobblemon.species.mushling.desc: Consuming the spores from this Pokémon has been known to cause psychic hallucinations. It can also lead to nausea and migraines, it is not advised.
cobblemon.species.psycholyte.name: Psycholyte
cobblemon.species.psycholyte.desc: Upon evolution, this Pokémon goes hunting for a suitable stick. They form a strong bond with the chosen stick and use it to channel its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.shroomage.name: Shroomage
cobblemon.species.shroomage.desc: The spores that Shroomage give off have been found to be dangerous. Hallucinations and other symptoms can sometimes last days. Some people believe the spores grant the consumer special powers.
cobblemon.species.calfpint.name: Calfpint
cobblemon.species.calfpint.desc: They are usually found around their mothers, who are typically raised on farms. It is uncommon to see them by themselves in the wild. When startled, they charge.
cobblemon.species.arbird.name: Arbird
cobblemon.species.arbird.desc: Arbird are sent off on their own mere hours after hatching, left to fend for themselves. Their dense armor keeps them safe from potential predators.
cobblemon.species.girafaraf.name: Girafaraf
cobblemon.species.girafaraf.desc: Exposure to the energy of a Dawn Stone has allowed for the front brain to gain full control of itself. The rear brain withers and becomes just a standard tail.
cobblemon.species.giragira.name: Giragira
cobblemon.species.giragira.desc: Exposure to the energy of a Dusk Stone has strengthened the rear brain of Girafarig. In the process of evolution, the rear brain has convinced the front brain to surrender its power, giving control to the darker half.
cobblemon.species.whave.name: Whave
cobblemon.species.whave.desc: An outgoing whale Pokémon that generally dwells in the deep seas. It is playful with other Pokémon as long as it's not battling.
cobblemon.species.orcabyss.name: Orcabyss
cobblemon.species.orcabyss.desc: A ferocious creature that will impale anything that moves too quickly in an aggressive manner. Its horn is strong enough to burrow through glaciers.
cobblemon.species.zapalope.name: Zapalope
cobblemon.species.zapalope.desc: A Pokémon that zips through dense forests with ease. Its electrical energy allows it to move at high speeds. You can tell a Zapalope trail by the singed edges of the plants around it.
cobblemon.species.joltalope.name: Joltalope
cobblemon.species.joltalope.desc: A Pokémon that expends high amounts of energy during its active hours. During its resting hours, it sleeps for long periods of time in overgrown forest nests. The foliage starts to take root in Joltalopes fur.
cobblemon.species.mewthree.name: Mewthree
cobblemon.species.mewthree.desc: Thorn created this creature, via genetic manipulation, using DNA from Mewtwo and Deoxys. It was meant to be a counter to Arkhaos, but has never been put to the test.
cobblemon.species.snampery.name: Snampery
cobblemon.species.descargot.name: Descargot
cobblemon.species.gastesla.name: Gastesla
cobblemon.species.flasinge.name: Flasinge

cobblemon.species.swolphin.name: Swolphin
cobblemon.species.norspear.name: Norspear
cobblemon.species.narvalor.name: Narvalor
cobblemon.species.cefireon.name: Cefireon
cobblemon.species.cefireon.desc: Draconeon are considered exotic and are rarely seen outside of Blackthorn City in Johto. Though smaller than most dragons, Draconeon are fierce and passionate.
cobblemon.species.polekin.name: Polekin
cobblemon.species.fungorse.name: Fungorse
cobblemon.species.cervantrier.name: Cervantrier
cobblemon.species.lugnis.name: Lugnis
cobblemon.species.luravit.name: Luravit
cobblemon.species.luxpiravit.name: Luxpiravit
cobblemon.species.quisquite.name: Quisquite
cobblemon.species.gambarrel.name: Gambarrel
cobblemon.species.bogaleon.name: Bogaleon
cobblemon.species.astrem.name: Astrem
cobblemon.species.unktena.name: Unktena
cobblemon.species.ufi.name: UFI
cobblemon.species.ufi.desc: An unidentified infantile Pokemon, from beyond the visible universe. It has taken up residence in the Oort Cloud.
cobblemon.species.shyleon.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleon.desc: An exceptionally timid Pokémon always wearing a mask that covers it face. The mask itself seems to be its power source.
cobblemon.species.shyleonterrestrial.des: The Red Energy enhanced its ability to camouflage. It is almost impossible to detect Shyleon in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.desc: It Aquired magic powers after absorbing the Blue Energy. It was revered as a deity by an ancient civilization.
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.desc: Shyleon's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this serpentine Pokémon wraps around enemies until it chokes them.
cobblemon.species.trishout.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishout.desc: Despite its size, it can already shout very loudly. If it cries too much, it becomes voiceless and coughs smoke.
cobblemon.species.trishoutterrestrial.de: It has become more competitive thanks to the Red Energy. It goes wild during battle, releasing scorching flames from its horn.
cobblemon.species.trishoutxenoversal.des: The Blue Energy has given it an overwhelming explosive power. It ejects air from the ports on its body to boost its fiery roars.
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.desc: Trishout's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokémon attacks its enemies ruthlessly until you knock them out.
cobblemon.species.shulong.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulong.desc: Its blue covering skin is very elastic and can rebound attacks. However, it is extremely sensitive to cold.
cobblemon.species.shulongterrestrial.des: The energy of Planet Earth has turned its skin into a coriaceous armor. After every wound, it comes back harder.
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.desc: Blue Energy has made it vicious and territorial. No one is able to take on it underwater.
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.desc: Shulong's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shulongx.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokémon stuns its enemies from behind, then takes advantage of them and hits them relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.sparkowl.name: Sparkowl
cobblemon.species.sparkowl.desc: It has a peaceful nature and attacks only when threatened. First it paralyzes the enemy with a weak electric shock, then runs away.
cobblemon.species.shawkbird.name: Shawkbird
cobblemon.species.shawkbird.desc: You can see flocks of Shawkbird during storms. If you touch one of them while it's flying, you will get zapped.
cobblemon.species.harrowk.name: Harrowk
cobblemon.species.harrowk.desc: It lives on mountaintops that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. It stores electricity in its cloud, then plummets down to strike its prey.
cobblemon.species.yemin.name: Yemin
cobblemon.species.yemin.desc: It constantly undertakes an intense meditation training. As a result of this, it is always super focused in battles.
cobblemon.species.kungfur.name: Kungfur
cobblemon.species.kungfur.desc: Thanks to the strong experience it has acquired in countless battles, it teaches weak Pokémon to fight. It is very strict as an instructor.
cobblemon.species.masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.masgot.desc: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.fire_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.fire_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.ghost_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.ghost_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.

cobblemon.species.psychic_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.psychic_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.dragon_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.dragon_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.fairy_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.fairy_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokémon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.bremand.desc: It is said this Pokémon represents the soul of music. It has full control over its voice so that it can adapt to any kind of song.
cobblemon.species.guitarist_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.guitarist_bremand.desc: It is said this Pokémon represents the soul of music. The electrifying solos it plays with its big whiskers will make your hair stand on end.
cobblemon.species.drummer_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.drummer_bremand.desc1: It is said this Pokémon represents the soul of music. Thumping its chest with two drumsticks, it boost the morale to anyone who's listening.
cobblemon.species.bassist_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.bassist_bremand.desc1: It is said this Pokémon represents the soul of music. It quietly strims its tail, but occasionally it can play unexpectedly energetic grooves.
cobblemon.species.puppillon.name: Puppillon
cobblemon.species.puppillon.desc: It takes control of other Pokémon to do whatever it wants. However, it does this not with malevolence, but just because it is bashful.
cobblemon.species.hangead.name: Hangead
cobblemon.species.hangead.desc: It controls Pokémon and human beings as puppets using its strings. Feeding on their life energy, it turns their bodies in soul-less empty shells.
cobblemon.species.nunvil.name: Nunvil
cobblemon.species.nunvil.desc: Behind its lovely graceful appearance lies a spiteful side. It will terrify its enemies just for fun.
cobblemon.species.whisteract.name: Whisteract
cobblemon.species.whisteract.desc: Whisteract haunts abandoned mansions, jealously guarding everything inside. It's said to be very vengeful towards raiders.
cobblemon.species.blingrimm.name: Blingrimm
cobblemon.species.blingrimm.desc: It is a real miners' nightmare. A single touch of its metal claws and you will be badly intoxicated.
cobblemon.species.blingrudge.name: Blingrudge
cobblemon.species.blingrudge.desc: Compressing and releasing its spiked tail, it will pierce even the thickest walls. It builds complicated tunnels in mazes to exhaust its preys.
cobblemon.species.hikiloo.name: Hikiloo
cobblemon.species.hikiloo.desc: Hikiloo is a perfect partner for beginners. It will always follow orders by its Trainer it sees as a leader.
cobblemon.species.mylomute.name: Mylomute
cobblemon.species.mylomute.desc: Extremely loyal and intelligent Pokémon. It is widely used for pulling sleds since it can scent the safe route even in a blizzard.
cobblemon.species.kidoon.name: Kidoon
cobblemon.species.kidoon.desc: It's incredible fertile in ponds and swamps. It feeds on microorganisms it filters with its large mouth.
cobblemon.species.honchen.name: Honchen
cobblemon.species.honchen.desc: Revered as a deity in the past. Somewhere in the world, there's still the tradition to welcome the new year dedicating it a dance.
cobblemon.species.persage.name: Persage
cobblemon.species.persage.desc: It can see the future through its crystal ball. Those who ask it for prediction more than three times will be cursed for life.
cobblemon.species.koinkoin.name: Koinkoin
cobblemon.species.koinkoin.desc: The more it moves, the more is the gold it drops from its navel. After an intense struggle, its Trainer will make plenty of Nuggets.
cobblemon.species.beefle.name: Beefle
cobblemon.species.beefle.desc: It runs around full of vitality and charges into bigger and stronger Pokémon. Its external shell hardens over time.
cobblemon.species.punchbug.name: Punchbug
cobblemon.species.punchbug.desc: They hang on tree branches, letting Beefle punching them to store the energy required to evolve.
cobblemon.species.hercurcules.name: Hercurcules
cobblemon.species.hercurcules.desc: It overcomes opponents with its huge body. It categorically refuses to battle against a Pokémon it doesn't deem worthy.
cobblemon.species.chigami.name: Chigami
cobblemon.species.chigami.desc: Its skin has the same properties as the paper. Apparently origamis were invented looking at this exact Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.grudako.name: Grudako
cobblemon.species.grudako.desc: According to the legend, this origami crane came to life thanks to a mystical melody after the death of its child creator.
cobblemon.species.sabolt.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.sabolt.desc: Information about this Pokémon is shrouded in mystery. It is said to have appeared after a power outage.
cobblemon.species.saboltterrestrial.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.saboltterrestrial.desc: It looks like the Red Energy had somehow affected this Pokémon. Wrapped in the darkness of its cloak, it shoots thunderbolts all of sudden.
cobblemon.species.saboltxenoversal.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.saboltxenoversal.desc: It appears to be affected by the Blue Energy too, becoming fierce and savage. It fires immense dark lightning bolts from its mane charged with electricity.
cobblemon.species.gachigachoo.name: Gachigachoo
cobblemon.species.gachigachoo.desc: It withstands low temperatures thanks to its thick fur coat. If you rub that, it will charge with static electricity and electrocute.
cobblemon.species.hystearic.name: Hystearic
cobblemon.species.hystearic.desc: If someone tries to yank them out of the ground while they're sleeping, these Pokemon will shriek out loud making even large size Pokemon dizzy.
cobblemon.species.wystearia.name: Wystearia
cobblemon.species.wystearia.desc: It chatters non-stop in the shade of its foliage. Whoever accidentally catches the sound waves from its floreal antennas will have to swallow it endless babble.
cobblemon.species.pepequeno.name: Pepequeno
cobblemon.species.pepequeno.desc: It is coated with an oily, spicy substance. Pretending to be a Berry, it waits for someone to bite it. Then it laughs out loud on its own joke.
cobblemon.species.scovile.name: Scovile
cobblemon.species.scovile.desc: The color of its tail is indicative of its body temperature and its actual mood. If it rampages, it will burn everything down.
cobblemon.species.scovilex.name: ScovileX
cobblemon.species.scovilex.desc: The Scovile owned by Dimension Colonel Dahlia. When ingested, its seeds will electrocute the body from the inside.
cobblemon.species.excalibould.name: Excalibould
cobblemon.species.excalibould.desc: This rock pile came to life thanks to the combative spirit of past paladins that inhabited the sword wedged in it.
cobblemon.species.madieval.name: Madieval
cobblemon.species.madieval.desc: It is said that the mystical energy which fills this Pokemon and makes its stones float around is somehow related to the Moon's influence.
cobblemon.species.rockapye.name: Rockapye
cobblemon.species.rockapye.desc: Despite its clumsy appearance, it is a very quick learner if followed step by step. Each Rockapye has a diffferent handprint.
cobblemon.species.troglolith.name: Troglolith
cobblemon.species.troglolith.desc: It is supposed to be the missing evolutionary link. In ancient times, males and females used to raise wild Pokémon in two very different ways.
cobblemon.species.sputnink.name: Sputnink
cobblemon.species.sputnink.desc: Apparently it was found on Earth after a meteor impact. It blends in an ink puddle, then sneaks out to attack.
cobblemon.species.nebyura.name: Nebyura
cobblemon.species.nebyura.desc: A Pokémon from outer space. Using its terrible psychic powers it can drive creatures it establishes mental connection with crazy.
cobblemon.species.birigiri.name: Birigiri
cobblemon.species.birigiri.desc: They swim around thanks to the energy they share with the whole shoal. Due to its high calorie value, Chubiburny is known to be their favorite prey.
cobblemon.species.chubiburny.name: Chubiburny
cobblemon.species.chubiburny.desc: Its pelt contains sugary high-calorie substances. It peacefully basks in the sunlight, ignoring Birigiri's bites.
cobblemon.species.goombear.name: Goombear
cobblemon.species.goombear.desc: It can freely stretch its limbs by burning off everything it has eaten. Before hibernation or when it has no food, it will even burn its own stilts.
cobblemon.species.manticoeur.name: Manticoeur
cobblemon.species.manticoeur.desc: This Pokemon has a moody temper. It lures prey with its sweet face, then sucker punches them using its stinger.
cobblemon.species.fatail.name: Fatail
cobblemon.species.fatail.desc: Extremely slick, it has a tendency to take advantage on its fellows. Only a few Trainers are able to develop a trustful relationship with it.
cobblemon.species.reindear.name: Reindear
cobblemon.species.reindear.desc: It judges the behavior of other Pokémon, then marks them with tags. It rewards with a gift those who have been nice.
cobblemon.species.reindigo.name: Reindigo
cobblemon.species.reindigo.desc: Contrary to popular belief, it is a gentle soul. Actually, the cause for its constantly sullen face seems to lie in the excessive weight of its antlers.
cobblemon.species.sosqwatch.name: Sosqwatch
cobblemon.species.sosqwatch.desc: It wanders around on snowy mountains with its own original style. It assists whoever's been stranded by avalanches and keeps them warm.
cobblemon.species.vroombug.name: Vroombug
cobblemon.species.vroombug.desc: It has an excellent balance and drives around running on a tire. Once that is over worn, it looks for another new one.
cobblemon.species.skravroom.name: Skravroom
cobblemon.species.skravroom.desc: Rival gangs compete for territories in really noisy speed races that make anyone around run away.
cobblemon.species.chikaboo.name: Chikaboo
cobblemon.species.chikaboo.desc: It has to take care of itself from birth. It doesn't know how to provide food yet, so it plays on others' pity to survive.
cobblemon.species.peckabone.name: Peckabone
cobblemon.species.peckabone.desc: It feeds merely on what it steals from predators. First it deters them with the skull-like pattern, then digs into its target.
cobblemon.species.rexquiem.name: Rexquiem
cobblemon.species.rexquiem.desc: Said to only reveal to people and Pokémon about to die to drag them to the afterlife. It is also known as 'the Emissary of the Devil'.
cobblemon.species.scaracno.name: Scaracno
cobblemon.species.scaracno.desc: This Pokemon is supposed to be a physical manifestation of the Bug-type phobia mankind has always had since ancient times.
cobblemon.species.scaracluo.name: Scaracluo
cobblemon.species.scaracluo.desc: The fear of dangers lurking in the darkness, usually seen among children, has somehow spawned this weird Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.name: Scarphasmo
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.desc: According to several tales, a mad scientist created this creature by combining parts of different Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.tokakle.desc: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.green_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.green_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.yellow_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.yellow_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.red_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.red_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.donanas.name: Donanas
cobblemon.species.donanas.desc: This very shy Pokemon rarely counterattacks. When in danger, it withdraws in its shell as hard as steel.
cobblemon.species.chimaooze.name: Chimaooze
cobblemon.species.chimaooze.desc: The most polluted areas of cities are infested by Chimaooze. When they senses danger, they team up together to eliminate the threat.
cobblemon.species.monster_chimaooze.name: Chimaooze
cobblemon.species.bandeon.name: Bandeon
cobblemon.species.bandeon.desc: It can perfectly replicate the sound of any musical instrument. Once it learns a melody, this Pokémon will never forget it.
cobblemon.species.scaleon.name: Scaleon
cobblemon.species.scaleon.desc: It takes flight by spreading its big ears as if they were wings. It viciously threaten anyone who enters its den in the mountains.
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.name: PorygonWES
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.desc: It was updated with the most cutting-edge technology ever created. It was originally meant to be an assistant in PokéWES.
cobblemon.species.electaburst.name: Electaburst
cobblemon.species.electaburst.desc: The excessive energy unleashed during evolution split up its body. It combines thunders and flares to set off terrible explosions all around.
cobblemon.species.chientilly.name: Chientilly
cobblemon.species.chientilly.desc: It secretes ice-fresh cream from its tail. If the quality doesn't match its high requirements, it throws that away.
cobblemon.species.dusmee.name: Dusmee
cobblemon.species.dusmee.desc: It desperates for attention and makes everything with the sole purpose of getting noticed. When it fails, it starts whining as a baby.
cobblemon.species.egohiss.name: Egohiss
cobblemon.species.egohiss.desc: It periodically sheds its skin trying to remove any flaws. Because this process makes Egohiss blind, its tail serves as a radar that senses its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.egorgeon.name: Egorgeon
cobblemon.species.egorgeon.desc: It has a paralyzing glare it refracts through the scales on its body. In this way, it catches prey and dresses them up with its old leather.
cobblemon.species.chiripe.name: Chiripe
cobblemon.species.chiripe.desc: It has the habit of swinging back and forth while hanging upside down on trees. Because of that, it is usually mistaken for a fruit.
cobblemon.species.batnana.name: Batnana
cobblemon.species.batnana.desc: Its diet has changed and now it is trying to take its first steps into hunting. However, it is very clumsy and makes preys slip away.
cobblemon.species.vesperfum.name: Vesperfum
cobblemon.species.vesperfum.desc: It is a perfect hunter. Pretending to be a flower, it waits for preys to approach attracted by its scent, then strikes lightning-fast.
cobblemon.species.croakling.name: Croakling
cobblemon.species.croakling.desc: It uses its fingers as a sling to shoot ignited rocks with its extremely elastic membranes. Its aim is not that good though.
cobblemon.species.bullverin.name: Bullverin
cobblemon.species.bullverin.desc: It membranes toughen up during evolution, turning similar to glass. When it blows up, spits out fiery cannonballs.
cobblemon.species.croakraze.name: Croakraze
cobblemon.species.croakraze.desc: All of its fights is a spectacular show. Surrounded by flames, it melts the glass on its arms, leaving an elegant trail of crystals behind.
cobblemon.species.inflant.name: Inflant
cobblemon.species.inflant.desc: It floats because of its large ears. Really competitive, it always looks for an opponent to challenge in swimming.
cobblemon.species.floatusk.name: Floatusk
cobblemon.species.floatusk.desc: Floatusk will plough into everything and everyone to prove its strength. It swells water to look bigger.
cobblemon.species.swelephant.name: Swelephant
cobblemon.species.swelephant.desc: Before a fight, it pumps water in its muscles to strengthen its fists. However, this power-up has a specific time limit.
cobblemon.species.luxflon.name: Luxflon
cobblemon.species.luxflon.desc: A legendary Pokémon that protects planet Earth. It has full control over nature it can shape at its will.
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.name: Dragalisk
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.desc: Sealed in the Xenoverse, lusting for power. By planting its tail in the ground, it subtracts vital energy from the planet, making it sterile and infertile.
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.name: DragaliskX
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.desc: This being, created to replace the Dark Lord, is a concentration of pure Fury energy. Although it's smaller to the original Dragalisk, it's still very powerful and lethal.
cobblemon.species.dielebi.name: Dielebi
cobblemon.species.dielebi.desc: It seems somehow related to Celebi. Unlike its counterpart, Dielebi travels across past and future alternate dimensions.
cobblemon.species.reginalous.name: Reginalous
cobblemon.species.reginalous.desc: Its body is formed by Anomalous energy from various dimensions. It creates strong winds of bright pink color that changes the alterations of each dimension.
cobblemon.species.orchynx.name: Orchynx
cobblemon.species.orchynx.desc: Metal plates underneath its fur protect it from harm. It replenishes its energy by basking in the sun's rays.
cobblemon.species.metalynx.name: Metalynx
cobblemon.species.metalynx.desc: METALYNX stalk their prey in packs. Their brutally sharp tail blades are their main weapon.
cobblemon.species.raptorch.name: Raptorch
cobblemon.species.raptorch.desc: RAPTORCH are energetic Pokémon that require constant attention, or they will start setting their surroundings on fire.
cobblemon.species.archilles.name: Archilles
cobblemon.species.archilles.desc: With a specialized saddle and reins, ARCHILLES can be ridden. Make sure that you have earned its trust first.
cobblemon.species.eletux.name: Eletux
cobblemon.species.eletux.desc: ELETUX is capable of generating strong magnetic fields around its feet and tail that allow it to walk on water.
cobblemon.species.electruxo.name: Electruxo
cobblemon.species.electruxo.desc: ELECTRUXO can use the magnetic waves they generate as radar. This allows them to see even in pitch darkness.
cobblemon.species.chyinmunk.name: Chyinmunk
cobblemon.species.chyinmunk.desc: The length of a CHYINMUNK's stripes determines its authority in a group. If it spots a predator, it shrieks loudly to warn the others.
cobblemon.species.kinetmunk.name: Kinetmunk
cobblemon.species.kinetmunk.desc: Kinetmunk digs intricate tunnels that can stretch for miles underground. They use small electrical pulses to relax their muscles, allowing them to run faster.
cobblemon.species.birbie.name: Birbie
cobblemon.species.birbie.desc: It defends itself by dazzling opponents by flashing its brightly colored plumage. They are known for their elaborate mating dances.
cobblemon.species.aveden.name: Aveden
cobblemon.species.aveden.desc: The blue feathers on its chest reflect light. They use flashes to communicate with one another in the forest canopy.
cobblemon.species.splendifowl.name: Splendifowl
cobblemon.species.splendifowl.desc: Its spectacular plumage makes it a frequent target of poachers. However, due to the heavy feathers, it's not a great flyer.
cobblemon.species.cubbug.name: Cubbug
cobblemon.species.cubbug.desc: It shares characteristics with bug and mammal Mon. Being in its presence has a calming effect.
cobblemon.species.cubblfly.name: Cubblfly
cobblemon.species.cubblfly.desc: It scatters pollen and seeds in order to help flowers grow. It always smells like flower petals.
cobblemon.species.nimflora.name: Nimflora
cobblemon.species.nimflora.desc: It scatters pollen and seeds in order to help flowers grow. It always smells like flower petals.
cobblemon.species.barewl.name: Barewl
cobblemon.species.barewl.desc: Incredibly dense metals make up BAREWL's body. They are much heavier than they look. They live in dark caves and feed on rocks and metal ore.
cobblemon.species.dearewl.name: Dearewl
cobblemon.species.dearewl.desc: It is a stubborn Pokemon that will always stand its ground, even against a much larger opponent. it uses its horn to dig for metal ore.
cobblemon.species.gararewl.name: Gararewl
cobblemon.species.gararewl.desc: A gentle giant, GARAREWL are peaceful herbivores but won't hesitate to defend themselves if attacked. they whip foes using the razor wire on their head.
cobblemon.species.grozard.name: Grozard
cobblemon.species.grozard.desc: Its snakelike body is almost always partially underground. The tunnels they dig can serve as pitfalls for the unwary traveler.
cobblemon.species.terlard.name: Terlard
cobblemon.species.terlard.desc: Terlard's two heads have completely independent brains and are prone to argument. That they ever manage to coordinate at all is a miracle.
cobblemon.species.tonemy.name: Tonemy
cobblemon.species.tonemy.desc: New trainers traveling through caves are advised to bring along antidotes against a TONEMY's poison, which causes great pain if it isn't treated immediately.
cobblemon.species.tofurang.name: Tofurang
cobblemon.species.tofurang.desc: Unable to fly or move swiftly like TONEMY, TOFURANG instead catch their prey by exhaling a poison gas that makes Mon sluggish.
cobblemon.species.dunseraph.name: Dunseraph
cobblemon.species.dunseraph.desc: Said to be descended from a DUNSPARCE that climbed Sky Pillar. It is a powerful flyer and can alter the air pressure at will.
cobblemon.species.fortog.name: Fortog
cobblemon.species.fortog.desc: This Pokemon is rarely seen walking because of its weight. Rather, it rolls to get anywhere. They are often found at the bottoms of ponds.
cobblemon.species.folerog.name: Folerog
cobblemon.species.folerog.desc: FOLEROG can't swim but they need to remain damp to survive, so they are found in grasslands next to rivers and lakes.
cobblemon.species.blubelrog.name: Blubelrog
cobblemon.species.blubelrog.desc: BLUBELROG are the masters of the calm water. They are very social and form communities in and around freshwater lakes.
cobblemon.species.feleng.name: Feleng
cobblemon.species.feleng.desc: Although FELENG is small and weak, it can manipulate other Mon just by giving them a pleading look and meowing cutely.
cobblemon.species.felunge.name: Felunge
cobblemon.species.felunge.desc: FELUNGE are expert hunters, able to see in very low light and move without a sound. Many people keep them to deter pests such as CHYINMUNK.
cobblemon.species.feliger.name: Feliger
cobblemon.species.feliger.desc: Many trainers are disappointed when FELUNGE evolves because it gets fat and lazy. It can crush foes under its enormous body mass.
cobblemon.species.empirilla.name: Empirilla
cobblemon.species.empirilla.desc: When PRIMEAPE beats its rivals, it wins the right to wear the Jungle Crown, evolving it to the noble EMPIRILLA, much stronger and more intelligent. A natural leader of other Mon, EMPIRILLA have learned to control their rage and use it to increase their power in battle.
cobblemon.species.owten.name: Owten
cobblemon.species.owten.desc: OWTEN are mainly seen at night, when they are looking for berries and other individuals of its species. Their eyes reflect light and appear as red dots in the darkness. They are known for their lovely singing voice.
cobblemon.species.eshouten.name: Eshouten
cobblemon.species.eshouten.desc: ESHOUTEN are shy and elusive, found only at night around mountains. Their incredible eyesight allows them to see clearly up to three miles away. If you see red circles in a tree at night, it is light reflected from their eyes.
cobblemon.species.alteranowten.name: AlteranOwten
cobblemon.species.alteranowten.desc: Alteran OWTEN is beloved by many due to its cute appearance and lovely singing voice. It knows this, and is not above using cuteness to get what it wants
cobblemon.species.alteraneshouten.name: AlteranEshouten
cobblemon.species.alteraneshouten.desc: People and Mon of all sorts follow it around to hear it sing. Analyzing its songs has determined that it views these hangers-on with disdain.
cobblemon.species.smore.name: Smore
cobblemon.species.smore.desc: If a SMORE approaches your picnic, it's not trying to steal your food, it just wants attention. Still, some people are afraid of them.
cobblemon.species.firoke.name: Firoke
cobblemon.species.firoke.desc: Its belly is filled with super hot lava that it sprays at its opponent through the nozzle on its abdomen. Its aim is precise.
cobblemon.species.brailip.name: Brailip
cobblemon.species.brailip.desc: This Mon is known for its intelligence. It can't swim fast, but it hides among coral reefs, using its psychic powers to detect others.
cobblemon.species.brainoar.name: Brainoar
cobblemon.species.brainoar.desc: Called 'The sage of the sea', BRAINOAR is said to posses all the wisdom of the ocean. It is calm and dislikes fighting.
cobblemon.species.sponee.name: Sponee
cobblemon.species.sponee.desc: The sponge-like skin of this Mon is found in all parts of the ocean. How this Mon survives in salt water is a mystery. It fills its sponge-like skin with water and carries it into its hive. It can release all the stored water at once.
cobblemon.species.sponaree.name: Sponaree
cobblemon.species.sponaree.desc: SPONEE are covered by a bizarre sponge-like material. When dropped, they bounce.
cobblemon.species.pahar.name: Pahar
cobblemon.species.pahar.desc: PAHAR are intelligent and are commonly kept as pets. They can even be taught to talk, although not to the degree of CHATOT.
cobblemon.species.palij.name: Palij
cobblemon.species.palij.desc: PALIJ's curiously-shaped feathers allow it to create friction in the air as it flaps its wings. Sparks trail off of its feathers when it flies.
cobblemon.species.pajay.name: Pajay
cobblemon.species.pajay.desc: Every year, massive flocks of PAHAR and PALIJ migrate from Tandor to the Sevii Islands. A PAJAY leads each one.
cobblemon.species.baashaun.name: Baashaun
cobblemon.species.baashaun.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.baaschaf.name: Baaschaf
cobblemon.species.baaschaf.desc: Now that it is able to stand on two legs, it can use more kicking and punching attacks. It loves to fight dirty and use underhanded tactics. Unlike its previous evolution, however, it is rather playful.
cobblemon.species.baariette.name: Baariette
cobblemon.species.baariette.desc: A master at fighting dirty, BAARIETTE like to ensure that their foes can never oppose them again.
cobblemon.species.tricwe.name: Tricwe
cobblemon.species.tricwe.desc: Related to SMORE and SPONEE, TRICWE is very hyperactive and loves nothing better than sneaking up behind trainers and scaring them.
cobblemon.species.harylect.name: Harylect
cobblemon.species.harylect.desc: HARYLECT gather near sources of electricity and therefore are drawn to human dwellings and power plants. They can plug their antennae into a wall socket to recharge.
cobblemon.species.costraw.name: Costraw
cobblemon.species.costraw.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.trawpint.name: Trawpint
cobblemon.species.trawpint.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.modrille.name: Modrille
cobblemon.species.modrille.desc: MODRILLE hate being confined within any space and will always drill their way out of it. Trainers are advised to keep spare Pokéballs on hand.
cobblemon.species.drilgann.name: Drilgann
cobblemon.species.drilgann.desc: Often used as beasts of burden, a Drilgann can tunnel many miles in a single day without getting tired. Their claws can be spun separately to drill with precision.
cobblemon.species.cocaran.name: Cocaran
cobblemon.species.cocaran.desc: When Cocaran retracts its eyes and legs, it is almost indistinguishable from a coconut. Their shells are very buoyant, so they float in water.
cobblemon.species.cararalm.name: Cararalm
cobblemon.species.cararalm.desc: Unlike their preevolutions, Cararalm cannot swim, so they stay on land. The height of their palm tree indicates how close they are to evolving.
cobblemon.species.cocancer.name: Cocancer
cobblemon.species.cocancer.desc: Cocancer bury themselves in the sand and are indistinguishable from ordinary palm trees. When prey walks by, they leap out and crush it with massive claws.
cobblemon.species.corsoreef.name: Corsoreef
cobblemon.species.corsoreef.desc: Their bodies are a host to a wide variety of other species. In return for a home, they give Corsoreef the ability to inflict status effects on its foes.
cobblemon.species.tubjaw.name: Tubjaw
cobblemon.species.tubjaw.desc: TUBJAW are able to unhinge their jaws in order to swallow prey larger than their head. Their teeth are sharper than razors.
cobblemon.species.tubareel.name: Tubareel
cobblemon.species.tubareel.desc: A fierce, deep-sea hunter, this Mon is particularly vengeful towards humankind and will tear up fishing nets.
cobblemon.species.cassnail.name: Cassnail
cobblemon.species.cassnail.desc: It dissolves minerals in sand and uses them to form a hard carapace on its back. It lives in coastal regions.
cobblemon.species.sableau.name: Sableau
cobblemon.species.sableau.desc: The colorful patterns on its shell makes them desirable to collectors. Their cast-off shells are often used in jewelry.
cobblemon.species.escartress.name: Escartress
cobblemon.species.escartress.desc: Its shell has hardened into a nearly unbreakable fortress. It shoots water from the turrets on its back.
cobblemon.species.nupin.name: Nupin
cobblemon.species.nupin.desc: Nupin is the largest single-celled organism on the planet. It obtains energy from photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.gellin.name: Gellin
cobblemon.species.gellin.desc: Nupin is the largest single-celled organism on the planet. It obtains energy from photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.barand.name: Barand
cobblemon.species.barand.desc: The appendage at the end of its tail is its primary form of attack, and it is able to deftly manipulate objects with it as if it were a hand.
cobblemon.species.glaslug.name: Glaslug
cobblemon.species.glaslug.desc: A Mon highly sensitive to the changes in seasons, Glaslug come and go with the warm undersea currents.
cobblemon.species.glavinug.name: Glavinug
cobblemon.species.glavinug.desc: GLAVINUG are rare but not hard to trace, due to the ice crystals they leave behind when they swim.
cobblemon.species.s51.name: S51
cobblemon.species.s51.desc: A peculiar life-form that hovers above the ground with a mysterious force. Rumors say they came from outer space.
cobblemon.species.s51a.name: S51-A
cobblemon.species.s51a.desc: Some people suspect that S51-A, Beeheyem, and Clefable are conspiring to invade the planet. No one is safe.
cobblemon.species.paraudio.name: Paraudio
cobblemon.species.paraudio.desc: It is highly sensitive to sound and can perfectly replicate any sound it hears, even human speech. It loves to hear fast, rhythmic music.
cobblemon.species.paraboom.name: Paraboom
cobblemon.species.paraboom.desc: It uses massive sonic booms to attack from a distance. An encounter with one will leave your ears ringing for days.
cobblemon.species.chimical.name: Chimical
cobblemon.species.chimical.desc: A Mon said to be the product of genetic testing. The white spot on its back is its weak point.
cobblemon.species.chimaconda.name: Chimaconda
cobblemon.species.chimaconda.desc: Normally passive unless provoked, Chimaconda inject their prey with a paralytic venom and then wrap it in their tails, squeezing the life out.
cobblemon.species.tikiki.name: Tikiki
cobblemon.species.tikiki.desc: It hides its true face behind a wooden mask. They will often convene in order to dance elaborate dances.
cobblemon.species.frikitiki.name: Frikitiki
cobblemon.species.frikitiki.desc: It produces deep bellows and thumps from within its mask that can be heard for miles. It can summon all the Tikiki in an area and together they make music by drumming on their masks.
cobblemon.species.unymph.name: Unymph
cobblemon.species.unymph.desc: They inhabit mucky bogs and swamps. Although they are somewhat slow and weak in battle, they can extend their jaws rapidly to deliver a powerful blow.
cobblemon.species.harptera.name: Harptera
cobblemon.species.harptera.desc: A swift and fierce hunter. They can vibrate their wings at supersonic speeds in flight. They use their harpoon-shaped tails to skewer prey.
cobblemon.species.chicoatl.name: Chicoatl
cobblemon.species.chicoatl.desc: Chicoatl are shy, but can be affectionate. They are said to be related to both dragon and bird Mon.
cobblemon.species.quetzoral.name: Quetzoral
cobblemon.species.quetzoral.desc: Quetzoral often wrap themselves around long branches of trees and fall asleep. They dine on nectar from flowers.
cobblemon.species.coatlith.name: Coatlith
cobblemon.species.coatlith.desc: Early natives of Baykal worshipped Coatlith as gods. They are fiercely devoted to protecting nature, and will attack anyone who defiles it.
cobblemon.species.tracton.name: Tracton
cobblemon.species.tracton.desc: A mechanical dragon Mon that is often used to help construction workers. Its jaws can crumple steel with ease.
cobblemon.species.snopach.name: Snopach
cobblemon.species.snopach.desc: A Mon that roamed the tundra thousands of years ago. They used their small tusks to dig up berries and roots under the ice.
cobblemon.species.dermafrost.name: Dermafrost
cobblemon.species.dermafrost.desc: It charges forward with the unstoppable force of a glacier, and its punch can shatter solid rock. They were hunted to extinction by early humans.
cobblemon.species.slothohm.name: Slothohm
cobblemon.species.slothohm.desc: A very lazy Mon that lived thousands of years ago. They would climb to the top of trees and wait to be struck by lightning.
cobblemon.species.theriamp.name: Theriamp
cobblemon.species.theriamp.desc: A very lazy Mon that lived thousands of years ago. They would climb to the top of trees and wait to be struck by lightning.
cobblemon.species.titanice.name: Titanice
cobblemon.species.titanice.desc: They migrate all over the ocean, mainly at the poles but occasionally moving to warmer waters. What lies beneath the surface is a mystery.
cobblemon.species.frynai.name: Frynai
cobblemon.species.frynai.desc: A favored Mon of ninja clans. They propel themselves backwards through the water to attack with their sharp tails.
cobblemon.species.saidine.name: Saidine
cobblemon.species.saidine.desc: They are the bane of many fishermen as their bladed tails often cut fishing lines. They can change direction rapidly in the water.
cobblemon.species.daikatuna.name: Daikatuna
cobblemon.species.daikatuna.desc: It often wields Frynai or Saidine as weapons. The sword on its head is made from steel folded 10,000 times.
cobblemon.species.miasmedic.name: Miasmedic
cobblemon.species.miasmedic.desc: It has the ability to both cause and cure disease. Using its claws, it injects pathogens into its foes.
cobblemon.species.jackdeary.name: Jackdeary
cobblemon.species.jackdeary.desc: It is related to BUNEARY, but far more crafty. It conceals itself using trickery, so many people don't believe it exists.
cobblemon.species.winotinger.name: Winotinger
cobblemon.species.winotinger.desc: It combines illusion and trickery with physical strength. Because it only reveals itself to drunk people, it was considered an imaginary Mon until very recently.
cobblemon.species.duplicat.name: Duplicat
cobblemon.species.duplicat.desc: This Mon has the ability to create and identical copy of itself or its opponent. These copies only last a few minutes before fading away.
cobblemon.species.nucleon.name: Nucleon
cobblemon.species.nucleon.desc: One of the only non-feral nuclear Mon. It's theorized that its bond with its trainer when it was an Eevee allows it to stay in control.
cobblemon.species.ratsy.name: Ratsy
cobblemon.species.ratsy.desc: They use the paint-like substance on their tails to mark their territory. They are considered pests as they will paint over brand new buildings.
cobblemon.species.raffiti.name: Raffiti
cobblemon.species.raffiti.desc: They spray paint to create signs that only Raffiti can understand. Their knowledge of color theory has led some to consider them artists on par with humans.
cobblemon.species.gargryph.name: Gargryph
cobblemon.species.gargryph.desc: They spend most of their time standing so still they are often mistaken for statues. They perch on the rooftops of Venisi, guarding it from outside attackers.
cobblemon.species.masking.name: Masking
cobblemon.species.masking.desc: It is capable of disguising itself as anything it likes. Although it appears to be a bird Mon, this is just an illusion. No one has seen its true form.
cobblemon.species.dramsama.name: Dramsama
cobblemon.species.dramsama.desc: A sinister and vengeful Mon, it puts its foes into an eternal sleep and steals their souls to add to its tail.
cobblemon.species.antarki.name: Antarki
cobblemon.species.antarki.desc: Said to be the ghost of a Mon that died before its time. It guides lost souls into the afterlife using the light of its small star.
cobblemon.species.chupacho.name: Chupacho
cobblemon.species.chupacho.desc: It comes out at night to suck the blood from sleeping prey. Its needles contain a numbing toxin that can incapacitate an enemy in minutes.
cobblemon.species.luchabra.name: Luchabra
cobblemon.species.luchabra.desc: It comes out at night to suck the blood from sleeping prey. Its needles contain a numbing toxin that can incapacitate an enemy in minutes.
cobblemon.species.linkite.name: Linkite
cobblemon.species.linkite.desc: The spirit of a Mon that died inside its Pokéball. It has forgotten its original appearance so it takes the form of a Substitute decoy.
cobblemon.species.chainite.name: Chainite
cobblemon.species.chainite.desc: A malicious and dangerous Mon, it seeks revenge against the trainer who abandoned it. Its shackles were reinforced in order to keep its violence in check.
cobblemon.species.pufluff.name: Pufluff
cobblemon.species.pufluff.desc: It constantly wraps itself in its long tail to protect it from the cold. Despite this, it always seems to shiver as if it is freezing.
cobblemon.species.alpico.name: Alpico
cobblemon.species.alpico.desc: Its two tails are coated with a waxy material that allows it to glide over snow and ice. They are often seen hurtling down mountains at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.anderind.name: Anderind
cobblemon.species.anderind.desc: Its eyes are covered by a shield that protects it from blowing snow and ice. The one that can perform the wildest flips and tricks is deemed the leader.
cobblemon.species.colarva.name: Colarva
cobblemon.species.colarva.desc: The older they get, the sharper the ice spikes on their back become. Stepping on one buried under the snow is an unpleasant experience.
cobblemon.species.frosulo.name: Frosulo
cobblemon.species.frosulo.desc: It encases itself in a hard shell of unmelting ice and hangs upside-down from the ceilings of Lanthanite Cave, awaiting evolution.
cobblemon.species.frosthra.name: Frosthra
cobblemon.species.frosthra.desc: They leave a shimmering trail of ice crystals behind them as they fly. They are prized in many regions for their rarity and beauty.
cobblemon.species.fafurr.name: Fafurr
cobblemon.species.fafurr.desc: This Mon's shaggy coat keeps it warm in freezing weather. They are sought after by hunters for their silky fur.
cobblemon.species.fafninter.name: Fafninter
cobblemon.species.fafninter.desc: A gentle guardian of the mountains, this Mon will often escort lost travelers and Mon to safety by giving them a ride on its back.
cobblemon.species.shrimputy.name: Shrimputy
cobblemon.species.shrimputy.desc: It is able to fire a barrage of super-heated blasts from its cannon. Despite its small size, it is a very capable predator.
cobblemon.species.krilvolver.name: Krilvolver
cobblemon.species.krilvolver.desc: Called 'the ranger of the sea'. Its reaction times are nigh-instantaneous and its aim with its pistol is excellent due to its highly advanced eyesight.
cobblemon.species.lavent.name: Lavent
cobblemon.species.lavent.desc: It lives within igneous crevasses at the bottom of the sea and absorbs geothermal energy. When prey comes close, it spits out scalding hot water.
cobblemon.species.swabone.name: Swabone
cobblemon.species.swabone.desc: A favorite Mon of pirates. The bandanna it wears indicates which ship's crew it belongs to. It craves treasure and will hoard any gold and jewels it finds.
cobblemon.species.skelerogue.name: Skelerogue
cobblemon.species.skelerogue.desc: It requires seemingly no sustenance such as food or air. Although it can't swim, it will walk across the bottom of the sea until it makes it to shore.
cobblemon.species.navighast.name: Navighast
cobblemon.species.navighast.desc: Said to be the spirit of a mad pirate captain reincarnated as a Mon. Its spectral flames are icy cold to the touch.
cobblemon.species.stenowatt.name: Stenowatt
cobblemon.species.stenowatt.desc: It flaps its wings to generate electricity, which it stores in its tail. It channels the stored energy into its legs to run faster.
cobblemon.species.jungore.name: Jungore
cobblemon.species.jungore.desc: Its hide is studded with pieces of solid gold. Because of how valuable this Mon is on the black market, its population dwindled until it became extinct in the wild.
cobblemon.species.majungold.name: Majungold
cobblemon.species.majungold.desc: Its enormously heavy arms are made of solid gold. This Mon has developed extraordinarily strong muscles to hold them up.
cobblemon.species.hagoop.name: Hagoop
cobblemon.species.hagoop.desc: Its body exudes a sticky slime that protects its soft flesh. It traps prey in the slime and delivers a lightning shock through its whiskers.
cobblemon.species.haagross.name: Haagross
cobblemon.species.haagross.desc: The slime covering its body is toxic and corrosive. Between that and its electric bite, it has no known predators. They proliferate in contaminated areas.
cobblemon.species.xenomite.name: Xenomite
cobblemon.species.xenomite.desc: A species that spontaneously appeared in irradiated zones. It is thought to have hatched from a corrupt egg.
cobblemon.species.xenogen.name: Xenogen
cobblemon.species.xenogen.desc: A bizarre life form which thrives in irradiated locations. It is a parasitic creature that latches on to any prey and absorb its life force.
cobblemon.species.xenoqueen.name: Xenoqueen
cobblemon.species.xenoqueen.desc: It is known to spit radioactive acid capable of melting through steel. It is a ruthless predator that will attack any living creature, human or Mon.
cobblemon.species.hazma.name: Hazma
cobblemon.species.hazma.desc: They Appear in the afterMath of nuclear fallOut. They sponGe Up radiation and can rinSe an irradiated area over time.
cobblemon.species.geigeroach.name: Geigeroach
cobblemon.species.geigeroach.desc: Its simple body structure allows it survive intense levels of radiation. They multiply rapidly and will eat anything in sight.
cobblemon.species.minicorn.name: Minicorn
cobblemon.species.minicorn.desc: Its small stature, gentle demeanor and delicate features make it beloved by young children. A popular line of toys is based on it.
cobblemon.species.kiricorn.name: Kiricorn
cobblemon.species.kiricorn.desc: The hair in its mane is made of gossamer-thin threads and is impossibly soft. It will only allow those it trusts to touch it.
cobblemon.species.oblivicorn.name: Oblivicorn
cobblemon.species.oblivicorn.desc: Its powers are strongest at night when the moon is not visible. Only a veteran trainer can tame one well enough to ride it.
cobblemon.species.luxi.name: Luxi
cobblemon.species.luxi.desc: Simply being around a Luxi is said to increase one's fortune. Ceramic statues of them are good luck charms.
cobblemon.species.luxor.name: Luxor
cobblemon.species.luxor.desc: It polishes its jade tail until it glimmers with lustrous sheen. A clipping of this Mon's hair is said to bring good luck for 30 days.
cobblemon.species.luxelong.name: Luxelong
cobblemon.species.luxelong.desc: A Mon so rare and gentle, simply seeing one is said to bless someone with good fortune for a whole year.
cobblemon.species.praseopunk.name: Praseopunk
cobblemon.species.praseopunk.desc: A mysterious life-form that emerged one day out of a computer. When it unites with its twin, its powers multiply in strength.
cobblemon.species.neopunk.name: Neopunk
cobblemon.species.neopunk.desc: A highly intelligent Mon capable of traveling through cyberspace. Found in pairs alongside its twin, Praseopunk.
cobblemon.species.sheebit.name: Sheebit
cobblemon.species.sheebit.desc: These Mon live in packs in mountainous regions. They will often headbutt each other to improve their strength.
cobblemon.species.terrabbit.name: Terrabbit
cobblemon.species.terrabbit.desc: It uses its large, flexible tails to balance itself while it deals a series of rapid kicks and punches to its opponent.
cobblemon.species.laissure.name: Laissure
cobblemon.species.laissure.desc: A mighty Mon that is spoken of in legends. It causes earthquakes by pounding the ground with its massive tails.
cobblemon.species.volchik.name: Volchik
cobblemon.species.volchik.desc: They gather together during thunderstorms. Their chirping sounds like static electricity.
cobblemon.species.voltasu.name: Voltasu
cobblemon.species.voltasu.desc: It perches on rocky outcropping and looks at the sky for many hours. They can fortell changes in the weather.
cobblemon.species.yatagaryu.name: Yatagaryu
cobblemon.species.yatagaryu.desc: A fearsome Mon told about in legends. It has the power to summon thunderstorms at will.
cobblemon.species.devimp.name: Devimp
cobblemon.species.devimp.desc: A Mon that is said to come from a separate plane of existence. It is very curious about the world around it and often gets into mischief as a result.
cobblemon.species.fallengel.name: Fallengel
cobblemon.species.fallengel.desc: It acts like a soldier, obeying orders without hesitation. It seems to have no moral compass and will do whatever its master commands.
cobblemon.species.beliaddon.name: Beliaddon
cobblemon.species.beliaddon.desc: Its kind came out of a fiery chasm which contained an otherworldly portal. A furnace hotter than the sun burns within its chest. If it burns you, the pain will never fade.
cobblemon.species.seikamater.name: Seikamater
cobblemon.species.seikamater.desc: Its belly is filled with super hot lava that it sprays at its opponent through the nozzle on its abdomen. Its aim is precise.
