cobblemon.species.garlikid.name: Garlikid
cobblemon.species.garlikid.desc: Garlikid believes itself to be a savior of all Monkind. It will pick fights with anyone it considers villainous.
cobblemon.species.baitatao.name: Baitatao
cobblemon.species.baitatao.desc: Called the Boiling Wrath. Heat from its scales cause the water around it to boil. It attacks ships, melting the hull on contact.
cobblemon.species.leviathao.name: Leviathao
cobblemon.species.leviathao.desc: Called the Unstoppable Spear. The ice horn on its head can easily penetrate solid steel. It battles Baitatao and Krakanao for dominance over the sea.
cobblemon.species.krakanao.name: Krakanao
cobblemon.species.krakanao.desc: Called the Inescapable Malestrom. It causes massive whirlpools that drag everything - ships, Mon and people alike - into its bottomless maw.
cobblemon.species.lanthan.name: Lanthan
cobblemon.species.lanthan.desc: Legends say that it helped form part of the Tandor region. Along with its brothers Actan and Heatran, it placed metallic ores in the planet's crust.
cobblemon.species.actan.name: Actan
cobblemon.species.actan.desc: One of the Legendary Mon that formed the Tandor Region. It taught humans about the use of radioactive metals.
cobblemon.species.urayne.name: Urayne
cobblemon.species.urayne.desc: An artificial Mon created to be a source of unlimited energy. The more radioactive fuel it consumes, the greater its power becomes. At max potential, it can split atoms.
cobblemon.species.betaurayne.name: Urayne
cobblemon.species.betaurayne.desc: An artificial Mon created to be a source of unlimited energy. The more radioactive fuel it consumes, the greater its power becomes. At max potential, it can split atoms.
cobblemon.species.aotius.name: Aotius
cobblemon.species.aotius.desc: W h i t e l i g h t s h i n e s
cobblemon.species.mutios.name: Mutios
cobblemon.species.mutios.desc: B l a c k s h a d e p r o t e c t s
cobblemon.species.zephy.name: Zephy
cobblemon.species.zephy.desc: A mysterious Mon that appears to be a cross between Plusle and Articuno. In legends, it visited artists and gave them ideas for their next masterpiece.
cobblemon.species.mozz.name: Mozz
cobblemon.species.mozz.desc: It munches on leaves to absorb their photosynthetic properties. Its mossy coat allows it to camouflage among the treetops.
cobblemon.species.mosseer.name: Mosseer
cobblemon.species.mosseer.desc: Its PSI powers allow it a glimpse into the futures of those around it. It shares this knowledge in vague psychic visions and dreams.
cobblemon.species.daemoth.name: Daemoth
cobblemon.species.daemoth.desc: It's said that the eyes on DAEMOTH's wings can see many different futures. It hides from people to protect them from the fate it foresees.
cobblemon.species.chiklit.name: Chiklit
cobblemon.species.chiklit.desc: A poor flyer, it glides and hops from branch to branch to traverse the forests where it lives. It uses tiny bursts of fire to prey on smaller bug-type Pokémon and fend off attackers.
cobblemon.species.burnychus.name: Burnychus
cobblemon.species.burnychus.desc: A primal bird Pokémon that fights fiercely with barbed talons and fire breath. They are highly protective of their young.
cobblemon.species.pyropteryx.name: Pyropteryx
cobblemon.species.pyropteryx.desc: Descended from a common ancestor of bird and dinosaur Pokémon. Its developed feathers allow it to glide, leaving scorching flames in its wake.
cobblemon.species.findolf.name: Findolf
cobblemon.species.findolf.desc: A resilient Pokémon that thrives on land as well as it does in the water. To defend itself, it sprays a forceful water jet from the blowhole on its head.
cobblemon.species.delfender.name: Delfender
cobblemon.species.delfender.desc: The tanks on its shoulders can store water as well as air. This allows it to navigate many environments. It has a helpful and brave personality.
cobblemon.species.hydrocean.name: Hydrocean
cobblemon.species.hydrocean.desc: They are adept at putting out fires and conducting search-and-rescue operations. Its palms produce freezing rays that can douse a burning building.
cobblemon.species.minyan.name: Minyan
cobblemon.species.minyan.desc: Called the 'tiny master of evil', it tries to cause discord but often ends up messing up and fleeing in embarrassment.
cobblemon.species.vilucard.name: Vilucard
cobblemon.species.vilucard.desc: It constantly plots dastardly schemes to spread chaos and fear. However, its plans are always foiled by Herolune.
cobblemon.species.lunapup.name: Lunapup
cobblemon.species.lunapup.desc: Although small, it is very brave. it won't hesitate to protect weaker pokemon in danger. they can often be heard howling at the moon.
cobblemon.species.herolune.name: Herolune
cobblemon.species.herolune.desc: t rises with the moon to do battle with its sworn nemesis, Vilucard. it has a strong sense of justice and will protect those who cannot defend themselves.
cobblemon.species.selkid.name: Selkid
cobblemon.species.selkid.desc: They gather together on rocky shoals and sing together in harmony. Their human-like voices can be misleading because they sound like a child.
cobblemon.species.syrentide.name: Syrentide
cobblemon.species.syrentide.desc: Their song is hypnotic, and all who hear it are immobilized. Legends tell of shipwrecks that were caused by sailors who were captivated by their song.
cobblemon.species.cavamie.name: Cavamie
cobblemon.species.cavamie.desc: A cheerful, mild-natured Pokémon that is agreeable and affectionate to all. Their friendly attitude makes them popular as family pets.
cobblemon.species.capymigo.name: Capymigo
cobblemon.species.capymigo.desc: It has a tranquil nature and cannot be bothered by anything, even the most persistent annoyance. Just being near it is said to have a calming effect.
cobblemon.species.humborb.name: Humborb
cobblemon.species.humborb.desc: It harvests nectar all day, which its belly converts into a high-powered fuel. If one is low on energy, others will share their nectar reserves.
cobblemon.species.navibri.name: Navibri
cobblemon.species.navibri.desc: It has a flawless sense of direction, and can memorize migratory routes across hundreds of miles. They act as scouts for the flock.
cobblemon.species.squrmy.name: Squrmy
cobblemon.species.squrmy.desc: Underestimated by many, this little worm dreams of greatness. However, its body is soft and vulnerable, so it hides underground most of the time.
cobblemon.species.durtwurm.name: Durtwurm
cobblemon.species.durtwurm.desc: It secretes a sticky substance that it uses to attach clods of dirt to its body as protection. It rolls its body like a wheel to get around quickly.
cobblemon.species.tanupy.name: Tanupy
cobblemon.species.tanupy.desc: TANUPY have a keen sense of smell, and use it to locate food. They have been known to get into mischief stealing food from traveling Trainers.
cobblemon.species.tanscure.name: Tanscure
cobblemon.species.tanscure.desc: TANSCURE are sharp-eyed hunters known for traveling in packs. When raised carefully, they are loyal, but wild ones can be dangerous with their sharp fangs.
cobblemon.species.sluchuu.name: Sluchuu
cobblemon.species.sluchuu.desc: Although its appearance resembles PIKACHU, it is in fact a mollusk Pokémon more closely related to SHELLOS and GOOMY. It prefers a solitary lifestyle, and will not hesitate to shock those that disturb it.
cobblemon.species.gullitt.name: Gullitt
cobblemon.species.gullitt.desc: GULLITT will obsessively seek out and consume garbage, even when it has healthier options. Due to its toxic diet, no predators will touch it.
cobblemon.species.garbagull.name: Garbagull
cobblemon.species.garbagull.desc: It gluts itself on garbage until it grows too heavy to fly. It is one of the only known species that preys upon TRUBBISH and GARBODOR.
cobblemon.species.nidorimewintercoat.des: By migrating from colder regions to more temperate regions, this Mon can find better food and shelter to prepare for evolution.
cobblemon.species.nidorimesummercoat.des: From its usual arid habitat, it traverses long distances to temperate regions in order to find a more hospitable environment to evolve.
cobblemon.species.nidoregina.name: Nidoregina
cobblemon.species.nidoregina.desc: It dwells in palaces of snow, its striking white coat gleaming even brighter than its surroundings. Its greatest rival is NIDOREGUS.
cobblemon.species.nidoregus.name: Nidoregus
cobblemon.species.nidoregus.desc: Those with the largest horns lead armies of NIDORIME. It clashes with NIDOREGINA on the borders between hot and cold regions.
cobblemon.species.roadillo.name: Roadillo
cobblemon.species.roadillo.desc: It travels great distances by rolling its body into a wheel-like shape. Its durable outer shell allows it to roll over rough, uneven surfaces with ease.
cobblemon.species.armarauder.name: Armarauder
cobblemon.species.armarauder.desc: Aggressively territorial, they claim large stretches of highway as their turf. Known to travel in gangs, they will even run large trucks off the road.
cobblemon.species.pouchelet.name: Pouchelet
cobblemon.species.pouchelet.desc: Lately, more and more of them have made cities their home. It has the unfortunate habit of playing dead, even in the middle of the road.
cobblemon.species.grimmposs.name: Grimmposs
cobblemon.species.grimmposs.desc: Ever the survivalist, some departed POUCHELET rise as ghost Pokemon. Having lost its fear of collisions, it floats through everything with glee.
cobblemon.species.salmini.name: Salmini
cobblemon.species.salmini.desc: When it finds things on the riverbed, it tends to carry them around in its mouth. Some think its preferences can help predict how it evolves.
cobblemon.species.salmosaultfreshwater.d: SALMINI that mature in fresh water evolve into this form. It's fierce and territorial, and loves throwing stones as much as collecting them.
cobblemon.species.salmosaultsaltwater.de: SALMINI that mature in salty water evolve into this form. It carries a shell that it plays like a trumpet. Getting interrupted infuriates it.
cobblemon.species.taroot.name: Taroot
cobblemon.species.taroot.desc: It buries itself in the ground to avoid being eaten, but its leaf always sticks out. It is highly nutritious and targeted by many for food.
cobblemon.species.daikongus.name: Daikongus
cobblemon.species.daikongus.desc: It uses its hefty body to crush opponents. It is so heavy that its stomp attacks create tremors in the ground, scaring off predators to TAROOT.
cobblemon.species.magief.name: Magief
cobblemon.species.magief.desc: They are perceptive Pokemon able to see shiny objects from several miles away. They are known to horde treasures for the leaders of their flock.
cobblemon.species.corsuave.name: Corsuave
cobblemon.species.corsuave.desc: CORSUAVE are intelligent Pokemon employing cunning strategies to defeat enemies or evade threats. This nature makes them difficult to work with.
cobblemon.species.zorotsune.name: Zorotsune
cobblemon.species.zorotsune.desc: Illusory beings constantly waft from the smoke that billows from this Mon's body. When its tricks get exposed, it slinks away into its pipe.
cobblemon.species.nursa.name: Nursa
cobblemon.species.nursa.desc: The mild shocks it delivers through its paw pads have a healing effect. It can use slightly stronger shocks to revive fainted Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.cuspide.name: Cuspide
cobblemon.species.cuspide.desc: Scientists have found that its exoskeleton has a similar composition to tooth enamel. For good health, it should be brushed twice daily.
cobblemon.species.tarandible.name: Tarandible
cobblemon.species.tarandible.desc: It lies still during the day, disguised as a Pokémon's skull. As it prowls at night, it makes an eerie noise that sounds like rattling bones.
cobblemon.species.gunafix.name: Gunafix
cobblemon.species.gunafix.desc: In the wild, it picks apart rocks deep underground to feed on rare ores. It has adapted to urban environments by taking refuge in factories.
cobblemon.species.fixinit.name: Fixinit
cobblemon.species.fixinit.desc: When properly trained, it can easily troubleshoot machinery. However, it loves to take things apart, so it can't be left unsupervised.
cobblemon.species.comite.name: Comite
cobblemon.species.comite.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.cometeor.name: Cometeor
cobblemon.species.cometeor.desc: It levitates in the air with powerful psychic energy. The crystals on its body flash many colors when it meets another of its kind.
cobblemon.species.astronite.name: Astronite
cobblemon.species.astronite.desc: It levitates in the air with powerful psychic energy. The crystals on its body flash many colors when it meets another of its kind.
cobblemon.species.spelotl.name: Spelotl
cobblemon.species.spelotl.desc: A bubble serves as a lens to amplify its psychic powers, letting it perceive the pitch-dark caves it lives in with perfect clarity.
cobblemon.species.salamancer.name: Salamancer
cobblemon.species.salamancer.desc: By focusing its power through a stalactite, SALAMANCER can manipulate water. It blocks passage into its lair by putting up watery barriers.
cobblemon.species.ledlite.name: Ledlite
cobblemon.species.ledlite.desc: When it draws in electric current through its tail, its head starts glowing. It can stay lit for a whole month on an hour's worth of charge.
cobblemon.species.insulatex.name: Insulatex
cobblemon.species.insulatex.desc: Its entire body is a battery that can store and discharge power at 99% efficiency. If it overcharges, it enters a wild frenzy.
cobblemon.species.negawatt.name: Negawatt
cobblemon.species.negawatt.desc: Its ruptured head constantly leaks power, requiring it to consume large amounts of electricity. It causes blackouts by attacking power lines.
cobblemon.species.sputya.name: Sputya
cobblemon.species.sputya.desc: It was created to assist in space exploration. Instead of rocket fuel, it converts sunlight into psychic energy for propulsion.
cobblemon.species.flager.name: Flager
cobblemon.species.flager.desc: A playful and somewhat feisty species that can often be a challenge for inexperienced trainers due to how energetic they are. FLAGER use their large paws to bat at any small moving object, including their own burning tails.
cobblemon.species.inflagetah.name: Inflagetah
cobblemon.species.inflagetah.desc: Its slim body is streamlined to be as aerodynamic as possible. It moves faster than the eye can follow, leaving a blazing trail behind.
cobblemon.species.jerbolta.name: Jerbolta
cobblemon.species.jerbolta.desc: The spines on its back stand rigid when charged with electricity. It is popular with children and young trainers due to its gentle demeanor.
cobblemon.species.karmilarie.name: Karmilarie
cobblemon.species.karmilarie.desc: When hunting, it generates inaudible but highly destructive sound waves. If it can't feed on life energy, it subsists on electricity.
cobblemon.species.cactana.name: Cactana
cobblemon.species.cactana.desc: It burrows into the ground to avoid the sun, its tail peeking out so it can still photosynthesize. It looks just like a regular cactus this way.
cobblemon.species.emberge.name: Emberge
cobblemon.species.emberge.desc: This Pokémon is born at sites of calamitous fires. Though still hot to the touch, its flames only burn at 200 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.aerapin.name: Aerapin
cobblemon.species.aerapin.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.albashell.name: Albashell
cobblemon.species.albashell.desc: It has a calm demeanor and enjoys ferrying passengers on its back. They are commonly employed as an airborne taxi service throughout Altera.
cobblemon.species.grizzlet.name: Grizzlet
cobblemon.species.grizzlet.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.geogriff.name: Geogriff
cobblemon.species.geogriff.desc: When the tiny crystals that continuously grow from beneath its fur shatter, it enters a state of hibernation, and emerges months later with a sharper set.
cobblemon.species.diastryx.name: Diastryx
cobblemon.species.diastryx.desc: A powerful apex predator. It claims entire mountains as its territory, gliding high above and using its keen eyesight to detect any intruders or threats.
cobblemon.species.smettle.name: Smettle
cobblemon.species.smettle.desc: Smettle is a mischievous Pokémon. It likes to use its quills to make fun of other Pokémon, which doesn't attract it friends.
cobblemon.species.smyucca.name: Smyucca
cobblemon.species.smyucca.desc: Smyucca has a very aggressive temperament. It is strongly forbidden to rub against its sharp spines.
cobblemon.species.demonagave.name: Demonagave
cobblemon.species.demonagave.desc: Demonagave's body is entirely covered by spines. Its Needle Arm is often fatal.
cobblemon.species.pachyball.name: Pachyball
cobblemon.species.pachyball.desc: When Pachyball sneezes, sprays of magma come out of its trunk, burning everything in their path. Before falling asleep, it rolls itself into a ball to keep its body warm, which earned it its name.
cobblemon.species.pachyndou.name: Pachyndou
cobblemon.species.pachyndou.desc: Pachyndou's psychic powers and bright colors are an excellent protection against potential predators. When it feels threatened, smoke comes out of the hole on its head.
cobblemon.species.pachyvory.name: Pachyvory
cobblemon.species.pachyvory.desc: Pachyvory's tusks are very resistant. When they become too big, it melts the end with its fiery breath.
cobblemon.species.squini.name: Squini
cobblemon.species.squini.desc: The harpoon-shaped cap on Squini's head can be illuminated so that it is not lost from sight by its fellows. It emits less and less light as it gets ready to evolve.
cobblemon.species.squinja.name: Squinja
cobblemon.species.squinja.desc: Squinja is a fast and accurate fighter. It generally prefers to keep its enemies at a distance, but is quite capable of close combat.
cobblemon.species.squartial.name: Squartial
cobblemon.species.squartial.desc: Squartial never takes rash risks. Each of its moves is well thought out. Contrary to its pre-evolutions, it is relatively solitary.
cobblemon.species.wormini.name: Wormini
cobblemon.species.wormini.desc: Wormini spends its time digging in the ground and rarely sees the light of day.
cobblemon.species.wormeel.name: Wormeel
cobblemon.species.wormeel.desc: Wormini spends its time digging in the ground and rarely sees the light of day.
cobblemon.species.malarva.name: Malarva
cobblemon.species.malarva.desc: Malarva is a parasite that likes to settle on large Pokémon to feed on their blood. It is said that the first strains of the Pokérus were found on this Pokémon and that it is the cause of its propagation.
cobblemon.species.mosdeng.name: Mosdeng
cobblemon.species.mosdeng.desc: Mosdeng lives in wetlands and attacks in packs, which makes it more dangerous. However, it remains very vulnerable to Swellow which make it one of their favorite meals.
cobblemon.species.mosboom.name: Mosboom
cobblemon.species.mosboom.desc: Mosboom is able to explode in the face of predators to protect its offspring as soon as the need arises. When it stings its preys, it inoculates a very powerful poison capable of making a Ursaring fall in 5 seconds.
cobblemon.species.antager.name: Antager
cobblemon.species.antager.desc: Antager is small but don't be fooled by appearances, it can lift up to 50 times its weight.
cobblemon.species.antoldier.name: Antoldier
cobblemon.species.antoldier.desc: Antoldier have an extraordinary power, they can lift a Snorlax without any efforts. They are used in mines to help humans.
cobblemon.species.hamerry.name: Hamerry
cobblemon.species.hamerry.desc: Hamerry is a very popular Pokémon among children. Its cheeks give off a sweet smell, and give it a very friendly look.
cobblemon.species.hamysos.name: Hamysos
cobblemon.species.hamysos.desc: Hamysos is a festive Pokémon. It is said that its cheeks are actually large Ceriz berries, and that tasting them causes a euphoric state.
cobblemon.species.goatanaa.name: Goatanaa
cobblemon.species.goatanaa.desc: Goatanaa lives in the mountains. It moves according to the weather, when it is hot, it seeks the coolness in the heights and when the winter arrives, it goes down in the valleys.
cobblemon.species.goaturly.name: Goaturly
cobblemon.species.goaturly.desc: Goaturly is bred for its precious wool, which is both soft and resistant. It is used to make rich clothes. It is in perpetual conflict with Frison because of their ego.
cobblemon.species.pomara.name: Pomara
cobblemon.species.pomara.desc: Pomara live near lakes and rivers. They like to gather to parade at the water's edge.
cobblemon.species.dashean.name: Dashean
cobblemon.species.dashean.desc: Dashean is a sea horse. It is able to gallop on the water at impressive speeds.
cobblemon.species.boonny.name: Boonny
cobblemon.species.boonny.desc: Boonny's body is essentially made of meteorite, which does not prevent it from jumping extremely high.
cobblemon.species.rabball.name: Rabball
cobblemon.species.rabball.desc: After evolution, this Pokémon is enclosed in a meteoric shell. It is able to resist the trampling of a horde of Tauros.
cobblemon.species.lagorite.name: Lagorite
cobblemon.species.lagorite.desc: Lagorite uses its arms as both a shield and a sharp blade. A Meteor Mash from this Pokémon knocks out a Rhydon
cobblemon.species.llampas.name: Llampas
cobblemon.species.llampas.desc: Llampas are cheerful Pokémon with carefree attitudes, which makes them a common choice for new trainers. Although, the Pollen from their fur is especially strong, causing anyone nearby to sneeze violently.
cobblemon.species.danfluff.name: Danfluff
cobblemon.species.danfluff.desc: Danfluff aren't particularly bright, but they are devoted to their trainer. With a single command, they can spread out thousands of pollen spores with one swipe of their tail, causing entire Pollen Storms all on their own.
cobblemon.species.alfalphalops.name: Alfalphalops
cobblemon.species.alfalphalops.desc: The rocky hump on the back of an Alfalphalops can hold nearly a hundred of gallons of water. These special humps allow both them and their lucky trainers to endure even the most extreme of weather conditions.
cobblemon.species.therpal.name: Therpal
cobblemon.species.therpal.desc: The fluid visible in a Therpal's chest is a heated mixture of gases and oil. This allows them to travel at incredible speeds for short bursts, but due to their small size, they have to make frequent stops to make sure they don't run dry.
cobblemon.species.aspfault.name: Aspfault
cobblemon.species.aspfault.desc: Aspfault are highly social creatures. They often use their high body heat to drill through solid rock and stone, creating large tunnel networks inhabited by scores of Therpal and Asfault.
cobblemon.species.tarmendoa.name: Tarmendoa
cobblemon.species.tarmendoa.desc: Tarmendoa's glowing underside and breakneck speeds cause it look like little more than a blur of flame at night. Children often make wishes when they seem them, mistaking a Tarmendoa for a shooting star.
cobblemon.species.burbwhirl.name: Burbwhirl
cobblemon.species.burbwhirl.desc: A Burbwhirl's bubble can be used as a gauge for their emotions. Normally their bubble is rather small, but when they're out exploring the world, their bubble will expand with child-like wonder. However, if a Burbwhirl is frightened, its bubble will pop.
cobblemon.species.spoutlaw.name: Spoutlaw
cobblemon.species.spoutlaw.desc: When in battle, Spoutlaw will motionlessly stare down their opponent, hands hovering over the water pouches on their hips. At the slightest noise, Spoutlaw will lash out and shoot water from its pouches at blinding speeds.
cobblemon.species.vaquamael.name: Vaquamael
cobblemon.species.vaquamael.desc: Vaquamael are natural leaders and are often seen protecting other Pokémon. When someone is out causing trouble, a Vaquamael will rush to catch them using its powerful water lasso.
cobblemon.species.chewmunk.name: Chewmunk
cobblemon.species.chewmunk.desc: Chewmunk are prolific enough to have established a firm population in Kaskade's cities. Their friendly attitude towards people is a trait of a desirable pet, but their need to constantly shave their teeth by chewing makes them difficult pets.
cobblemon.species.cheekat.name: Cheekat
cobblemon.species.cheekat.desc: Cheekat isn't able evolve in the wild, so it's thought that they chose a feline form to be better suited for humans. This seems to have worked, as Cheekat are often used for their hypnotic abilities by those with insomnia.
cobblemon.species.specoey.name: Specoey
cobblemon.species.specoey.desc: Specoey are trained in acting from a young age. Due to this lifelong ability, they often partake in stage plays alongside young children. In some cases, the audience is unable to tell the difference.
cobblemon.species.opakespiel.name: Opakespiel
cobblemon.species.opakespiel.desc: Opakespiel are known for their constant ramblings and monologuing. But when the situation calls for it, an Opakespiel can stop its pulse and play dead for up to a month at a time.
cobblemon.species.kwaile.name: Kwaile
cobblemon.species.kwaile.desc: Scared of everything and often abandoned by their parents, young Kwaile will band together in militant groups. These groups often hunt young Sighlo and Sewaddle to showcase their superiority, but it rarely ever goes their way.
cobblemon.species.quailert.name: Quailert
cobblemon.species.quailert.desc: The need to protect its young is always on its mind. It digs holes and then covers Kwaile with its large wings.
cobblemon.species.quailstion.name: Quailstion
cobblemon.species.quailstion.desc: Its wings are caked with dirt and mud. When it comes to the ground, they combine their wings with the earth below them, creating a very strong barrier.
cobblemon.species.sighlo.name: Sighlo
cobblemon.species.sighlo.desc: It does almost nothing aside from sitting and eating all day. Easily eating its body weight in a sitting. It lets out an occasional sigh from loneliness.
cobblemon.species.cooreds.name: Cooreds
cobblemon.species.cooreds.desc: Like its previous evolution, it is pretty immobile. While waiting to evolve again, it practices making noises with its trumpet-like mouth.
cobblemon.species.probaska.name: Probaska
cobblemon.species.probaska.desc: After evolution, Probaska becomes upbeat and energetic. They are known to have large parties in some forests at night.
cobblemon.species.histameanie.name: Histameanie
cobblemon.species.histameanie.desc: Histameanie are infamous for hiding in tall grass and attacking unsuspecting passerby. Due to this, it is uncommon to see a trainer in Kaskade without a repel.
cobblemon.species.apheed.name: Apheed
cobblemon.species.apheed.desc: Apheed like to eat fruits and other plants together in a large swarm from the inside out. In the summer, berry farmers are very wary of Apheed.
cobblemon.species.musleafo.name: Musleafo
cobblemon.species.musleafo.desc: Musleafo are most common in the spring and summer, always on the hunt for more and more sweet nectar. They like to hunt together, although loners are not unheard of.
cobblemon.species.eecroach.name: Eecroach
cobblemon.species.eecroach.desc: Eeroach like to go in cities and disguise themselves as weeds in between sidewalks, they look for any sugary foods Pokemon or Humans leave behind.
cobblemon.species.swarm_eecroach.name: Eecroach
cobblemon.species.clamtrip.name: Clamtrip
cobblemon.species.clamtrip.desc: Being attracted to shiny objects, Clamtrip often fight among themselves, trying to steal the others pearls. Clamperl are their favorite prey.
cobblemon.species.rowviar.name: Rowviar
cobblemon.species.rowviar.desc: These small Pokémon travel in schools of 12 and tend to swim in a V formation. When one evolves into Sanook, they leave their colony to start a new one.
cobblemon.species.sanook.name: Sanook
cobblemon.species.sanook.desc: Sanook have immensely strong jaws that rival Pokémon such as Drednaw. Their beaks grow sharper with age, making elder Sanook the most powerful in their colony.
cobblemon.species.tofrug.name: Tofrug
cobblemon.species.kaskazog.name: Kaskazog
cobblemon.species.ananot.name: Ananot
cobblemon.species.ananot.desc: Ananots have a sticky mucus that smells like that of ripe Nanab berries. Although this mucus is inherently toxic, when properly processed they can be used for medicinal purposes.
cobblemon.species.ananoop.name: Ananoop
cobblemon.species.ananoop.desc: Ananoop are commonly mistaken for ripe fruit by tourists, though if touched have a gooey toxin so powerful it could cause temporary paralysis lasting several hours.
cobblemon.species.mosster.name: Mosster
cobblemon.species.mosster.desc: Mosster like to lay on roofs, using its fur to plant itself between the shingles. Large colonies of Mosster can form if not checked regularly.
cobblemon.species.mosskrat.name: Mosskrat
cobblemon.species.mosskrat.desc: Mosskrat run around in small packs, they choose the leader by who has the longest tail, although some packs follow alternate colored Mosskrat.
cobblemon.species.catteraxe.name: Catteraxe
cobblemon.species.catteraxe.desc: Catteraxe swing their axe like tail to clear anything in it's path. They are wild and uncontrollable pokemon, although many older women have a fondness for it.
cobblemon.species.catatomb.name: Catatomb
cobblemon.species.enigmeon.name: Enigmeon
cobblemon.species.enigmeon.desc: The origins of this Pokémon remain shrouded in mystery. While it evolves from the use of a Mist Stone, there is no record of Enigmeon existing at any point in the past.
cobblemon.species.desoray.name: Desoray
cobblemon.species.desoray.desc: With their whip like tail, they can attack with intense speed and power. They like to hide in the sand, using it as camouflage to catch their prey.
cobblemon.species.pudet.name: Pudet
cobblemon.species.pudet.desc: Pudet are very friendly pokemon, commonly kept as family pets. They will not hesitate to protect the ones it loves, even if it isn't strong enough to handle many threats.
cobblemon.species.woond.name: Woond
cobblemon.species.woond.desc: Back before the current era, a group of Woond saved many Kaskadian, Alolan, and Unovian soldiers in the Continental War. They are known for their bravery and intense perseverance.
cobblemon.species.pramblo.name: Pramblo
cobblemon.species.pramblo.desc: This Pokémon has a tube of hot glass coming off of its protective shell. This tube is formed from the glass leftover after the shells formation. Pramblo use it to interact with the outside world.
cobblemon.species.glashulimp.name: Glashulimp
cobblemon.species.drout.name: Drout
cobblemon.species.drout.desc: Drout is regarded as an ancestor to Sanook, although scientists are unsure of how both pokemon can co-exist in the same time period. They have weak lungs but choose to breathe through their gills.
cobblemon.species.dry_drout.name: Drout
cobblemon.species.guruchi.name: Guruchi
cobblemon.species.guruchi.desc: Guruchi have turbine-like tails which they use to process and condense water. This processed water can be shot at incredibly fast rates through the gap between its teeth, allowing Guruchi to cut wood with ease.
cobblemon.species.porygonomega.name: Porygon-Omega
cobblemon.species.estoe.name: Estoe
cobblemon.species.estoe.desc: Some say this Pokemon originated from another plane of existence. Lingering in its presence is considered dangerous due to the strange, cell altering energy it emits.
cobblemon.species.perpetua.name: Perpetua
cobblemon.species.perpetua.desc: As mysterious as Perpetua is, several high influencing leaders in history have shown odd favoritism for this Pokemon. It can emit a strange light from its frills.
cobblemon.species.tooburm.name: Tooburm
cobblemon.species.tooburm.desc: Tooburm are rarely seen above ground, choosing to eat potatoes and stay hidden. They have very weak electric type attacks that are launched from their prongs.
cobblemon.species.detrarc.name: Detrarc
cobblemon.species.detrarc.desc: The potato around Detrarc's neck is mature enough to appear to be fully grown. Farmers sometimes grab Detrarc up and get shocked as a result of it.
cobblemon.species.qayagus.name: Qayagus
cobblemon.species.auditaur.name: Auditaur
cobblemon.species.auditaur.desc: It's said that if an Auditaur begins to sing while you pet it, you'll receive many years of good luck. Its voice is very soft and used to calm small children down.
cobblemon.species.oxillery.name: Oxillery
cobblemon.species.oxillery.desc: Oxillery are among the loudest Pokemon ever recorded, although they prefer to replicate the noises they hear through their sensitive horns.
cobblemon.species.mienflux.name: Mienflux
cobblemon.species.gneckle.name: Gneckle
cobblemon.species.gneckle.desc: Gneckle are too weak to completely leave their shell, leaving them in a mostly immobile state. Female Rabyoose will do anything to protect a newborn Gneckle.
cobblemon.species.rabyoose.name: Rabyoose
cobblemon.species.rabyoose.desc: Most wild Rabyoose have no interest in humans or other Pokémon, making them hostile to anyone not of their kind. Rabyoose are known to aggressively charge at others in their pack to assert dominance.
cobblemon.species.tamroast.name: Tamroast
cobblemon.species.vitisquash.name: Vitisquash
cobblemon.species.vitisquash.desc: Vitisquash use their large feet to squish grapes it grows with fellow farmers. No one knows where they came from, just that they are gentle souls.
cobblemon.species.dionysseur.name: Dionysseur
cobblemon.species.umbralu.name: Umbralu
cobblemon.species.umbralu.desc: Umbralu have a dark aura in their underskirt that is pitch black and impossible to see through. Strong Unbralu can concentrate this energy to shoot beams of darkness that leach the opponents life force.
cobblemon.species.nomobjeka.name: Nomobjeka
cobblemon.species.nomobjeka.desc: The existence of Nomobjeka, a fun-loving guardian Pokémon, was just recently proven. It goes out in search of fainted wild Pokémon and guards them until they recover. These Pokémon can only be found in hidden areas shrouded by foliage, making them a rare sight in the wild.
cobblemon.species.kleptarak.name: Kleptarak
cobblemon.species.kleptarak.desc: These menacing Pokémon use their long legs and hand-like tail to rapidly climb in ways that defy gravity. Kleptarak are notorious for stalking their prey at night and snatching them into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.kituff.name: Kituff
cobblemon.species.beadamup.name: Beadamup
cobblemon.species.rascoom.name: Rascoom
cobblemon.species.faebril.name: Faebril
cobblemon.species.faebril.desc: By touching a pokemon or human with their wings, they can send healing pulses through them. They also are very strong defibrillator, even being able to start the heart of Wailord.
cobblemon.species.botnyak.name: Botnyak
cobblemon.species.botnyak.desc: Originally created by Tom Bezzle as a companion Pokémon, Botnyak were engineered to be extremely marketable. When the product flopped, Botnyak were repurposed by Amaze-All for other projects.
cobblemon.species.vendrom.name: Vendrom
cobblemon.species.buwuve.name: Buwuve
cobblemon.species.wasgrowl.name: Wasgrowl
cobblemon.species.worcane.name: Worcane
cobblemon.species.worcane.desc: This Pokémon is notoriously hard to train, but very rewarding when done right. Worcane are the alpha of the ocean, leading Pokémon on their team to victory.
cobblemon.species.probat.name: Probat
cobblemon.species.jemineye.name: Jemineye
cobblemon.species.jemineye.desc: Under the water, nothing is more aware than Jemineye. It always sees through its gem like eyes, even while it rests, it always is ready to escape.
cobblemon.species.oracub.name: Oracub
cobblemon.species.bearvoyance.name: Bearvoyance
cobblemon.species.bearvoyance.desc: Bearvoyance can use their psychic abilities to wisely predict their foes next move. Elder Bearvoyance love to work at daycares, giving words of wisdom to Pokémon while theyre still in eggs.
cobblemon.species.folleming.name: Folleming
cobblemon.species.folleming.desc: Follemings are mind controlled by the leader Folleming to do things against their will. When a Folleming is strong enough to resist the leaders mental commands, they will overthrow the current leader.
cobblemon.species.drosabell.name: Drosabell
cobblemon.species.drosabell.desc: Kaskadian Bellsprout who study on Spectoul Mountain awaken their true psychic abilities, evolving into Drosabell. They can force their presence into any creatures mind, normally using this ability to eat any weak pokemon around.
cobblemon.species.yanmage.name: Yanmage
cobblemon.species.bloomage.name: Bloomage
cobblemon.species.bloomage.desc: Shooting fireballs everywhere, they are known for causing trouble and chaos wherever they run to.
cobblemon.species.obsidious.name: Obsidious
cobblemon.species.mercryni.name: Mercryni
cobblemon.species.mercryni.desc: When startled, Mercryni cry tears of mercury. Its sharp spikes are corroded and rusty. Touching the spikes or tears of a Mercryni may result in hospitalization.
cobblemon.species.meraculisk.name: Meraculisk
cobblemon.species.meraculisk.desc: This Pokemon has gone under rigorous training to overcome even it's darkest fears and has mastered the manipulation of it's poison.
cobblemon.species.golgre.name: Golgre
cobblemon.species.prospectre.name: Prospectre
cobblemon.species.skideer.name: Skideer
cobblemon.species.yuleigh.name: Yuleigh
cobblemon.species.feafurr.name: Feafurr
cobblemon.species.feafurr.desc: Feafurr havent mastered the ability to control their fire based abilities, putting their bodies in an imbalanced limbo. Although they seem cowardly, Feafurr will always try their best.
cobblemon.species.vaicear.name: Vaicear
cobblemon.species.vaicear.desc: With a new found homeostasis, Vaicear have mastered the balance between fire and ice. This apex Pokémon once used their heated claws to traverse through the frigid arctic.
cobblemon.species.phisnooz.name: Phisnooz
cobblemon.species.phisnooz.desc: By waving their trunk, Phisnooz emit psychic waves that can put people to sleep in mere seconds. In a previous time they were the prey of Vaicear.
cobblemon.species.telemac.name: Telemac
cobblemon.species.telemac.desc: Telemac can speak telepathically with other Telemac, allowing them to call others when under attack by a pack of Vaicear. When in battle, Telemac use this ability to confuse other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.macedontus.name: Macedontus
cobblemon.species.macedontus.desc: As an ancestor to Sandshrew, a Macedontus can resist even the strongest attacks. Using their spiky tail, Macedontus can crush foes while defending itself.
cobblemon.species.crynorawst.name: Crynorawst
cobblemon.species.crynorawst.desc: Crynorawst are selfless, thinking only of others in a time of need. In Kaskadian mythology, a herd of Crynorawst were said to have moved mountains using their impressive horns.
cobblemon.species.rotomb.name: Rotomb
cobblemon.species.tamunk.name: Tamunk
cobblemon.species.tamunk.desc: As a scout for Manadza, it prepares the land for summer. It's said to have once been a Chewmunk and blessed with great power.
cobblemon.species.temunk.name: Temunk
cobblemon.species.temunk.desc: After being blessed by Arcitkull, Temunk was tasked with preparing Kaskade for Winter. Its touch causes plants to wither.
cobblemon.species.manadza.name: Manadza
cobblemon.species.manadza.desc: This Pokemon is known as 'The embodiment of Summer' by those who know of its existence. Its sheer power locked Kaskade in a seemingly endless summer thousands of years ago.
cobblemon.species.arctikull.name: Arctikull
cobblemon.species.arctikull.desc: This legendary Pokemon is called 'The embodiment of winter' by those who know of its existence. When its mouth opens, extremely cold fog flows out.
cobblemon.species.wicoot.name: Wicoot
cobblemon.species.wicoot.desc: This mythical Pokémon is cunning and intelligent, although these skills are mostly used to play pranks on others. Even with their mischievous demeanor, Wicoot is said to have brought peace between a clash of titans.
cobblemon.species.orbtholod.name: Orbtholod
cobblemon.species.pestalation.name: Pestalation
cobblemon.species.revylon.name: Revylon
cobblemon.species.leoseace.name: Leoseace
cobblemon.species.lamentu.name: Lamentu
cobblemon.species.endramodai.name: Endram-Odai
cobblemon.species.psypole.name: Psypole
cobblemon.species.psypole.desc: Psypole are very intelligent Pokémon that hatch with an orb. The orb helps them learn to control their psychic abilities.
cobblemon.species.telefrog.name: Telefrog
cobblemon.species.telefrog.desc: Telefrog has the ability to use its psychic powers to full effect. To train Telefrog one should do their best to develop a friendship with it.
cobblemon.species.tarotoad.name: Tarotoad
cobblemon.species.tarotoad.desc: When a person is acting strangely or suspiciously, it is a figure of speech to suggest that a Tarotoad is influencing their thoughts.
cobblemon.species.boxeroo.name: Boxeroo
cobblemon.species.boxeroo.desc: These feisty Pokemon play fight to display their markings. More markings are a source of pride for Boxeroo.
cobblemon.species.marsupunch.name: Marsupunch
cobblemon.species.marsupunch.desc: Marsupunch are proud of their scars, and often attempt to flaunt them in front of other Marsupunch. This inevitably results in more fighting.
cobblemon.species.kankombat.name: Kankombat
cobblemon.species.kankombat.desc: Kankombat are intimidating in stature, standing far taller than the average human grows. So, while it is dangerous to get on the wrong side of a Kankombat, it's quite easy to see them coming.
cobblemon.species.seijitsu.name: Seijitsu
cobblemon.species.seijitsu.desc: Seijitsu are pack Pokémon and become very protective of those close to them. They love to run around and chase other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.kousetsu.name: Kousetsu
cobblemon.species.kousetsu.desc: Kousetsu consider those close to them to be part of their pack, and will protect them by cuddling up to them for warmth.
cobblemon.species.mangetsu.name: Mangetsu
cobblemon.species.mangetsu.desc: Mangetsu have evolved to control the harsh cold weather, rather than merely surviving it. They use their sharp claws and keen senses to hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.rockroach.name: Rockroach
cobblemon.species.rockroach.desc: Rockroach mimic stones when trainers pass by. The moment they turn away, however, Rockroach will emerge to follow them.
cobblemon.species.boulderoach.name: Boulderoach
cobblemon.species.boulderoach.desc: Boulderoach chew up rocks to plaster on their shells. They have mined out entire caverns to reinforce the layers of stone and mud.
cobblemon.species.axolil.name: Axolil
cobblemon.species.axolil.desc: Axolil have a petrifying fear of drying out. If taken away from water and released, they will dowse for the nearest source of fresh water.
cobblemon.species.visimander.name: Visimander
cobblemon.species.visimander.desc: Visimander are alert Pokémon, whose sensitivity more than makes up for their blindness. They can physically and psychically map their surroundings in a fraction of a second.
cobblemon.species.webbat.name: Webbat
cobblemon.species.webbat.desc: Webbat's fangs excrete a potent venom, which coagulates blood into a thick, syrupy puck. Due to their small size, Webbat wait to ambush their victims.
cobblemon.species.vamprachne.name: Vamprachne
cobblemon.species.vamprachne.desc: Vamprachne spin their own wings out of sticky gossamer. They store food, attractive objects, and their unruly young in them.
cobblemon.species.cutesnoot.name: Cutesnoot
cobblemon.species.cutesnoot.desc: Cutesnoot love food, and often cause mischief while seeking for it. The easiest way to befriend a Cutesnoot is by leaving out an offering of food.
cobblemon.species.coatisnotti.name: Coatisnotti
cobblemon.species.coatisnotti.desc: Coatisnotti are tricksters who work in packs to steal food from humans and Pokémon. Each pack member has an assigned role in their schemes, based upon the Coatisnotti's strength.
cobblemon.species.ospuny.name: Ospuny
cobblemon.species.ospuny.desc: Ospuny have downy feathers, but rarely make a fuss about preening. They prefer to let their feathers naturally grow and fall out.
cobblemon.species.osprowl.name: Osprowl
cobblemon.species.osprowl.desc: Osprowl practice their flying maneuvers on prey and unsuspecting targets alike. Osprowl keep small collections of objects they have collected in daring flights.
cobblemon.species.ospredator.name: Ospredator
cobblemon.species.ospredator.desc: Ospredator are the bane of humans who attempt to research them. This is because they refuse to let intruders anywhere near their territory.
cobblemon.species.pakrat.name: Pakrat
cobblemon.species.pakrat.desc: Pakrat will live and forage almost anywhere, adding various finds to the pouch of leaves around their middle.
cobblemon.species.bakpakrat.name: Bakpakrat
cobblemon.species.bakpakrat.desc: Bakpakrat are nomadic, wandering the region, so they can deliver mail to humans and Pokémon alike.
cobblemon.species.royalarva.name: Royalarva
cobblemon.species.royalarva.desc: It is said that Royalarva look perpetually sad because they are ashamed of their ugliness.
cobblemon.species.superbpa.name: Superbpa
cobblemon.species.superbpa.desc: Superbpa spend long periods of time sleeping. Even when they are awake, they prefer to lay motionless inside flowers.
cobblemon.species.regalocera.name: Regalocera
cobblemon.species.regalocera.desc: While Regalocera are proud of their majestic beauty, they are far from cocky, spending most of their energy protecting and nourishing weaker Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.carapad.name: Carapad
cobblemon.species.carapad.desc: Carapad use their shells to mimic lily pads. People and Pokémon alike often fall for their disguise. But, if disturbed, Carapad will shoot a jet of water at the offender's face.
cobblemon.species.puripad.name: Puripad
cobblemon.species.puripad.desc: Puripad's air of gentleness draws in smaller Pokémon, who will then rest on their shells.
cobblemon.species.simpaima.name: Simpaima
cobblemon.species.simpaima.desc: It is so often distracted by the light reflecting off its body that it can hardly focus. They struggle to complete complex tasks.
cobblemon.species.arowisen.name: Arowisen
cobblemon.species.arowisen.desc: It is so often distracted by the light reflecting off its body that it can hardly focus. They struggle to complete complex tasks.
cobblemon.species.spidoux.name: Spidoux
cobblemon.species.spidoux.desc: Countless foragers of Vereshad have succumbed to Spidoux's poison after mistaking its abdomen for a Pecha Berry.
cobblemon.species.aracide.name: Aracide
cobblemon.species.aracide.desc: It can envenom the foe by biting or by being bitten. This Pokémon will intentionally leave itself open to attack.
cobblemon.species.mimectar.name: Mimectar
cobblemon.species.mimectar.desc: Mimetcar resemble unsuspecting sunflowers most of the time. If they are attacked, their monstrous true form will appear.
cobblemon.species.skittail.name: Skittail
cobblemon.species.skittail.desc: Timiphid are very weak, but they move fast. They move in unpredictable patterns to avoid being hit by attacks.
cobblemon.species.timiphid.name: Timiphid
cobblemon.species.timiphid.desc: Be careful when approaching Skittail. While they are quite timid, they may caller for help from something bigger.
cobblemon.species.chromite.name: Chromite
cobblemon.species.chromite.desc: When two Chromite meet, they will have a contest by hitting each other. The one whose armor cracks first loses.
cobblemon.species.oviseed.name: Oviseed
cobblemon.species.oviseed.desc: Oviseed almost never move. Doing so requires them to lift their roots, and that takes a lot of time and energy.
cobblemon.species.hoofern.name: Hoofern
cobblemon.species.hoofern.desc: The main body has grown its own legs, and the roots have receded. Hoofern can move freely.
cobblemon.species.asparies.name: Asparies
cobblemon.species.asparies.desc: The roots that were once its legs have grown around the body, protecting the Pokémon as it charges about.
cobblemon.species.pixipetal.name: Pixipetal
cobblemon.species.pixipetal.desc: Pixipetal try to dance, but often lose their balance. They use their vines to keep from falling over.
cobblemon.species.florafay.name: Florafay
cobblemon.species.florafay.desc: Florafay will string together many graceful gestures into a unique dance. Each movement means something different.
cobblemon.species.zapouch.name: Zapouch
cobblemon.species.zapouch.desc: Zapouch's life deep underwater is shrouded in mystery. They come to the surface of the ocean when they are ready to evolve.
cobblemon.species.mannovolt.name: Mannovolt
cobblemon.species.mannovolt.desc: Mannovolt ensnare prey with their appendages and deliver electric shocks. If Mannovolt are not careful, they can shock themselves.
cobblemon.species.hemocto.name: Hemocto
cobblemon.species.hemocto.desc: A tricky parasite, Hemocto will hold on to the nearest living thing and drain it of its blood. They can navigate well even in the murky ocean depths.
cobblemon.species.alucuttle.name: Alucuttle
cobblemon.species.alucuttle.desc: Alucuttle drain the blood of their prey before discarding it. Their sharp teeth were once used for knives.
cobblemon.species.sorroul.name: Sorroul
cobblemon.species.sorroul.desc: Always in tears. While trainers may comfort it to prevent it from wailing, Sorroul's tears will keep flowing.
cobblemon.species.depressoul.name: Depressoul
cobblemon.species.depressoul.desc: Depressoul will actively move away from those that tell it to feel better. It responds best to trainers that are willing to quietly sit beside it.
cobblemon.species.spectorment.name: Spectorment
cobblemon.species.spectorment.desc: The shrieks of Spectorment are said to evoke the most painful memories a person has experienced. Staying near one for extended periods is incredibly difficult to bear.
cobblemon.species.accerval.name: Accerval
cobblemon.species.accerval.desc: They are quick to chase small Pokémon, but will cower away from larger ones.
cobblemon.species.warrush.name: Warrush
cobblemon.species.warrush.desc: Because they run so fast, debris that strikes the body leaves permanent marks. The older a Warrush, the more scars it has.
cobblemon.species.hauntodile.name: Hauntodile
cobblemon.species.hauntodile.desc: It is said that Hauntodile hunts to add the prey's body heat to itself. However, its skin is always cold to the touch.
cobblemon.species.necrodile.name: Necrodile
cobblemon.species.necrodile.desc: Necrodile learn by eating the experiences of the dying. It learned to stand on two legs by eating the memories of humans, or so it is said.
cobblemon.species.gichet.name: Gichet
cobblemon.species.gichet.desc: Gichet have small jaws, but they will clack them together loudly when threatened.
cobblemon.species.crickjaw.name: Crickjaw
cobblemon.species.crickjaw.desc: Crickjaw have small bodies compared to their heads, which have grown substantially during evolution. Their massive jaws are supported by these large craniums.
cobblemon.species.tascorch.name: Tascorch
cobblemon.species.tascorch.desc: Tascorch always have a flame burning at the back of their throat. When they are sick, the fire burns at a lower temperature.
cobblemon.species.tastorture.name: Tastorture
cobblemon.species.tastorture.desc: Tastorture have numerous growths around their upper body. To some trainers, the more growths their Tastorture has, the cooler it is.
cobblemon.species.shrimpink.name: Shrimpink
cobblemon.species.shrimpink.desc: Oddly enough, Shrimpink emit a pleasant aroma that draws in Pokémon and humans alike. Their tough shells make them inedible, however.
cobblemon.species.armaroma.name: Armaroma
cobblemon.species.armaroma.desc: Armaroma emit a sickly-sweet smell from their bodies. It appears to confuse predators that rely on smell.
cobblemon.species.pricklebun.name: Pricklebun
cobblemon.species.pricklebun.desc: Timid and easily frightened, this Pokémon often avoids danger by hiding among cacti and other drybrush. The fruit that grows from its ears is used to make tasty jams and jellies.
cobblemon.species.cackrabbit.name: Cackrabbit
cobblemon.species.cackrabbit.desc: Although less skiddish than its predecessor, this Pokémon will spray needles by violently shaking its body whenever it feels threatened. This makes it a difficult Pokémon for young trainers to train.
cobblemon.species.sonoralope.name: Sonoralope
cobblemon.species.sonoralope.desc: Its powerful arms and legs enable this Pokémon to make huge bounds across the desert landscape. Sonoralope protects Pokémon from danger with thorny, bone-cracking kicks.
cobblemon.species.chubren.name: Chubren
cobblemon.species.chubren.desc: A bit of a glutton, this bird is a nuisance to grass-type Pokémon because of its constant attempts to eat their fruits.
cobblemon.species.roadren.name: Roadren
cobblemon.species.roadren.desc: Roadren speed over desert grounds at over 700 miles per hour. Before they start a run, their tails will flare in warning, letting others know to get out of the way.
cobblemon.species.malleamole.name: Malleamole
cobblemon.species.malleamole.desc: The tendrils on its nose can be shortened and lengthened, to an extent. It moves them around to feel its way forward.
cobblemon.species.shoxin.name: Shoxin
cobblemon.species.shoxin.desc: It will do a handstand just before it sprays poison. The poison is electrically conductive.
cobblemon.species.noxurge.name: Noxurge
cobblemon.species.noxurge.desc: Noxurge will coat their fur in a thin layer of poison. When startled, they will send electricity coursing through it to create a blinding flash.
cobblemon.species.calientoad.name: Calientoad
cobblemon.species.calientoad.desc: This easygoing Pokémon prefers to move as little as possible to conserve energy while avoiding anything flammable.
cobblemon.species.picantoad.name: Picantoad
cobblemon.species.picantoad.desc: This Pokémon has no agility with which to speak of. Instead, it shoots thick jets of lava from its eyes with impeccable accuracy and range.
cobblemon.species.volcantoad.name: Volcántoad
cobblemon.species.volcantoad.desc: The 'toad' in its name is a misnomer - they avoid water as much as they can. An organ in Volcántoad's throat is filled with lava, which they release while scaling mountains.
cobblemon.species.baquini.name: Baquini
cobblemon.species.baquini.desc: Due to overfishing, this Pokémon's population has dropped to almost zero in the wild.
cobblemon.species.modelfin.name: Modelfin
cobblemon.species.modelfin.desc: Modelfin shares an eerie connection with the netting around its neck. It cannot remove it by any means, but Modelfin can unravel the netting at will to astonish unwanted company.
cobblemon.species.muertapoise.name: Muertapoise
cobblemon.species.muertapoise.desc: It is said that the hook this Pokémon carries is used to sink fishing ships as penance for its own death.
cobblemon.species.oreon.name: Oreon
cobblemon.species.oreon.desc: Thought to be a mythical Pokemon, Oreon have only been seen by a small handful of trainers. It's soft, delicious body can regenerate rapidly.
cobblemon.species.muramoth.name: Muramoth
cobblemon.species.muramoth.desc: Lucemoth are social and friendly, often times forming close bonds with trainers and Pokemon. They are drawn to bright lights and shiny objects.
cobblemon.species.lucemoth.name: Lucemoth
cobblemon.species.lucemoth.desc: Unlike its relative Venomoth, a Muramoth foregoes flight, instead leaving its wings draped around it's body for protection. They prefer to live in total solitude.
cobblemon.species.drilladin.name: Drilladin
cobblemon.species.drasparath.name: Drasparath
cobblemon.species.drasparath.desc: It's body is dotted with holdes that loose intense jets of air. When agitated, it will send an electrical current through it's air streams to create violent thunderclouds.
cobblemon.species.mallarki.name: Mallar'Ki
cobblemon.species.mallarki.desc: The sprig of green onion it holds with it's beak is it's weapon of choice. It makes short work of most foes with a single, deft strike.
cobblemon.species.silviper.name: Silviper
cobblemon.species.silviper.desc: Silviper roamed the world as a ferocious predator in ancient times. It's long body is fortified with venom-infused silver scales.
cobblemon.species.zangoro.name: Zangoro
cobblemon.species.zangoro.desc: Zangaro are often spoken of in stories meant to frighten misbehaving children. Its black fur cloaks it during the night when it comes out to hunt prey.
cobblemon.species.goolossal.name: Goolossal
cobblemon.species.goolossal.desc: This enormous evolution of Goomy is entirely unique to the Hoenn region. Goolossal are often accompanied by hordes of Goomy that serve them willingly.
cobblemon.species.chrysalix.name: Chrysalix
cobblemon.species.chrysalix.desc: Chrysalix are a new species discovered by researchers conducting experiments on the crystalline Onix in Shoal Cave. They continue to grow larger with age.
cobblemon.species.slingray.name: Slingray
cobblemon.species.slingray.desc: It fashions a slingshot-like apparatus to it's fins using kelp from the seafloor. Slingray hunt by leaping out of the ocean and flinging rocks at unsuspecting prey.
cobblemon.species.bawlfrog.name: Bawlfrog
cobblemon.species.vitellion.name: Vitellion
cobblemon.species.metunn.name: Metunn
cobblemon.species.sandridger.name: Sandridger
cobblemon.species.sandridger.desc: It uses its large metal claws to defend against predators and dig large dens in the ground.
cobblemon.species.alolansandridger.name: Sandridger
cobblemon.species.alolansandridger.desc: It uses its large metal claws to defend against predators and dig large dens in the ground.
cobblemon.species.magnemelt.name: Magnemelt
cobblemon.species.magnemelt.desc: It is so surrounded by magma that you'll almost never see it's original body.
cobblemon.species.fleumingo.name: Fleumingo
cobblemon.species.fleumingo.desc: Despite the loss of flight, these Pokemon are incredibly fast, reaching up to 85 MPH at full speed.
cobblemon.species.loathedisc.name: Loathedisc
cobblemon.species.loathedisc.desc: It floats about pretending to be dead, waiting for its prey to approach before attacking.
cobblemon.species.gyropass.name: Gyropass
cobblemon.species.gyropass.desc: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
cobblemon.species.amacorala.name: Amacorala
cobblemon.species.amacorala.desc: It's hard as rock skin, and fast firing water from it's head made it the perfect frontline during conflict.
cobblemon.species.solacor.name: Solacor
cobblemon.species.solacor.desc: Its hard as rock skin, and fast firing water from it's head made it the perfect frontline during conflict.
cobblemon.species.dunmyth.name: Dunmyth
cobblemon.species.dunmyth.desc: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
cobblemon.species.dundragon.name: Dundragon
cobblemon.species.dundragon.desc: It can't fly, but it will use it's wings to jump incredibly high and reach enemies.
cobblemon.species.merlicun.name: Merlicun
cobblemon.species.merlicun.desc: It isn't considered very useful in any way what so ever. It seems to just want to crawl around and eat leaves.
cobblemon.species.firomenis.name: Firomenis
cobblemon.species.firomenis.desc: It isn't considered very useful in any way what so ever. It seems to just want to crawl around and eat leaves.
cobblemon.species.wolfum.name: Wolfum
cobblemon.species.wolfum.desc: It collects the fallen hairs and sheddings of other Pokemon to build a wolflike body, allowing it to blend in with other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.supiritto.name: Supiritto
cobblemon.species.supiritto.desc: This Pokémon will pretend to be an empty shedding and wait for it's prey to get close enough before attacking.
cobblemon.species.infernadeer.name: Infernadeer
cobblemon.species.infernadeer.desc: Loyal to a fault, it and Rapidash were in a constant rivarly as the preferred mount of kings. The metal that adorns its body is heatproof.
cobblemon.species.cradecart.name: Cradecart
cobblemon.species.cradecart.desc: Also known as the scavenger of the sea, it picks up discarded body parts of other acquatic Pokemon and builds a tough exoskeleton.
cobblemon.species.sylure.name: Sylure
cobblemon.species.sylure.desc: It baits stronger Pokemon with its weak appearance, before ambushing them with the full might of its traveling colony.
cobblemon.species.syrallure.name: Syrallure
cobblemon.species.syrallure.desc: The sweet aroma emitted from its mane is used in various cosmetics, but it is also lethal in high doses. Fairy tales about sightings of this Pokemon usually don't end well.
cobblemon.species.syrenade.name: Syrenade
cobblemon.species.syrenade.desc: Its beautiful voice allures sailors lost at sea. While they're distracted, Syrenade signals the other members of its colony to ransack their ships.
cobblemon.species.tartot.name: Tartot
cobblemon.species.tartot.desc: The bubbly coating encapsulating its body is nigh-impenetrable. Scientists have been studying its behaviour in different environments for quite some time.
cobblemon.species.teranigrade.name: Teranigrade
cobblemon.species.teranigrade.desc: A Tartot that was never exposed to powerful elements. The liquid that it's covered with absorbs most attacks.
cobblemon.species.fire_teranigrade.name: Teranigrade
cobblemon.species.fire_teranigrade.desc1: The chemically charged body of Tartot reacted to the heat of an active volcano, changing its body structure to a cellular level.
cobblemon.species.ice_teranigrade.name: Teranigrade
cobblemon.species.ice_teranigrade.desc1: The chemically charged body of Tartot reacted to the freezing air of a snowstorm, changing its body structure to a cellular level.
cobblemon.species.fire_teranigrade.name: Teranigrade
cobblemon.species.fire_teranigrade.desc1: The chemically charged body of Tartot reacted to poisonous chemicals of a famous laboratory, changing its body structure to a cellular level.
cobblemon.species.setsarec.name: Setsarec
cobblemon.species.setsarec.desc: Almost immobile, its rock-hard skin bounces back most attacks. It's said that if you make eye contact, you will be turned into stone.
cobblemon.species.snick.name: Snick
cobblemon.species.snick.desc: Snick always tend to store water in the top of their shell and later let it out to blow tramendous damage.
cobblemon.species.torsnail.name: Torsnail
cobblemon.species.torsnail.desc: Once Torsnail become more comfortable, they decide to extend out of their shell a little more.
cobblemon.species.wavstisnail.name: Wavstisnail
cobblemon.species.swove.name: Swove
cobblemon.species.swove.desc: Swove often move in groups of 4 until they grow older to prevent being easy targets for their prey.
cobblemon.species.eledove.name: Eledove
cobblemon.species.eledove.desc: Eledove show off their pretty feathers to attract all kinds of bird pokemon.
cobblemon.species.magnidove.name: Magnidove
cobblemon.species.magnidove.desc: Eledove show off their pretty feathers to attract all kinds of bird pokemon.
cobblemon.species.dampurr.name: Dampurr
cobblemon.species.dampurr.desc: Dampurr have very thick fur that can withstand both Liquids and Solids, it's body can take multiple attacks before the fur on it's body wears out.
cobblemon.species.soakcuff.name: Soakcuff
cobblemon.species.soakcuff.desc: Soakcuff shoot spouts of water out of their tail that make a very loud noiseto scare off any near enemies.
cobblemon.species.delugar.name: Delugar
cobblemon.species.delugar.desc: Delugar stay as a pack protecting baby Dampurr during the harsh weather when they can't survive for themselves yet.
cobblemon.species.caitlit.name: Caitlit
cobblemon.species.caitlit.desc: Caitlit spends much of its time pretending to be a normal kitten or other catlike Pokemon in order to fool trainers with its adorable eyes.
cobblemon.species.caitfyr.name: Caitfyr
cobblemon.species.caitfyr.desc: Caitfyr enjoys nothing more than taking trinkets from unsuspecting travelers and then playing games with those travelers for them to get them back with its masks.
cobblemon.species.blazesidhe.name: Blazesidhe
cobblemon.species.hissiorite.name: Hissiorite
cobblemon.species.hissiorite.desc: The base of it's neck emits super-heated gas that envelopes its body and causes it to have fewer inches off the ground, similar to a hot air balloon.
cobblemon.species.cobarett.name: Cobarett
cobblemon.species.cobarett.desc: It covers itself in thick, billowing smoke so that it can slide easily through thick brush. The source of the smoke is its molten body temperature.
cobblemon.species.pythonova.name: Pythonova
cobblemon.species.pythonova.desc: It is short tempered and when enraged, the flames on its back burn hotter and its smoke tail becomes thicker and longer.
cobblemon.species.waelin.name: Waelin
cobblemon.species.skreychee.name: Skreychee
cobblemon.species.bindshii.name: Bindshii
cobblemon.species.slinkee.name: Slinkee
cobblemon.species.slinkee.desc: Slinkee use their long slinky-like tail to strangle their prey, then spray it with their toxic water.
cobblemon.species.elinkee.name: Elinkee
cobblemon.species.elinkee.desc: Elinkee despite looking thick, can coil their bodies into dense springs and spring up to 200ft into the air.
cobblemon.species.serpensync.name: Serpensync
cobblemon.species.serpensync.desc: Serpensync are often mistaken for Rayquaza in the sky due to their long bodies and how fast they dash through the air. They use this speed to catch high flying prey.
cobblemon.species.cocoling.name: Cocoling
cobblemon.species.cocoling.desc: Newborn Cocoling sprout from fallen coconuts on the beach.
cobblemon.species.coconab.name: Coconab
cobblemon.species.coconab.desc: As Cocoling evolves into Coconab, it's shell starts to form a thick layer.
cobblemon.species.cocofested.name: Cocofested
cobblemon.species.cocofested.desc: By the time Coconab evolves into Cocofested, the thickness of its shell becomes rock solid.
cobblemon.species.chimeaura.name: Chimeaura
cobblemon.species.chimeaura.desc: Adapting to the sounds of it's environment can help Chimeaura in battle.
cobblemon.species.raccane.name: Raccane
cobblemon.species.raccane.desc: Raccane often get stuck in dumpsters looking for trash to eat.
cobblemon.species.draccane.name: Draccane
cobblemon.species.draccane.desc: It's said that Raccane that evolve into Draccane have proven to their kind that they can provide for their family.
cobblemon.species.raccolossus.name: Raccolossus
cobblemon.species.raccolossus.desc: It's said that Raccane that evolve into Draccane have proven to their kind that they can provide for their family.
cobblemon.species.baulder.name: Baulder
cobblemon.species.baulder.desc: Baulder has lived in the depths of Mythan for almost 7,000 years. It is said that this Pokemon is incredibly smart.
cobblemon.species.dredrock.name: Dredrock
cobblemon.species.dredrock.desc: Dredrock have one of the toughest coats known in Pokemon history, it's sad the weight of 5,000 tons can't even break it.
cobblemon.species.tekagon.name: Tekagon
cobblemon.species.tekagon.desc: Tekagon are massive Pokemon, barely fitting in many places, this is why they lived far underground for many years.
cobblemon.species.lavee.name: Lavee
cobblemon.species.lavee.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavare.name: Lavare
cobblemon.species.lavare.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavarator.name: Lavarator
cobblemon.species.lavarator.desc: Lavarator can break through any substance known to man, the pure heat of its blade arms can saw through titanium.
cobblemon.species.combateon.name: Combateon
cobblemon.species.combateon.desc: Combateon are known for their amazing dojo skills, they are always seen protecting Eevee in the wild.
cobblemon.species.crystaleon.name: Crystaleon
cobblemon.species.crystaleon.desc: Crystaleon is a Pokemon that is made up of many ores, its ores were harvested off its body back in the day.
cobblemon.species.toxeon.name: Toxeon
cobblemon.species.toxeon.desc: Toxeon is known to have some of the deadliest toxins in the world, be sure to not touch its toxic waste dripping from its body.
cobblemon.species.spectreon.name: Spectreon
cobblemon.species.spectreon.desc: After a certain Eevee died, it's body was later found next to a Flareon that had shared it's flame with it and became Spectreon.
cobblemon.species.aereon.name: Aereon
cobblemon.species.aereon.desc: When Mythan was formed, Aereon had to adapt to high altitudes, causing it to become more passive and calm, causing it to learn levitation.
cobblemon.species.duneon.name: Duneon
cobblemon.species.duneon.desc: Duneon have learned to enjoy each others company under all conditions because of how they were raised in caves and tunnels.
cobblemon.species.titaneon.name: Titaneon
cobblemon.species.titaneon.desc: Titaneon are known for their amazing stance, back in war times, Titaneon were used to protect small children.
cobblemon.species.ascenteon.name: Ascenteon
cobblemon.species.ascenteon.desc: Ascenteon were said to roam and protect Mythan back in ancient times, being the only Eevee's capable of using multiple elements at once.
cobblemon.species.sonareon.name: Sonareon
cobblemon.species.sonareon.desc: After a certain Eevee died, it's body was later found next to a Flareon that had shared it's flame with it and became Spectreon.
cobblemon.species.stingeon.name: Stingeon
cobblemon.species.stingeon.desc: Scorpeon can control the poison it delivers from its stingers, it has learned how to utilize its poison.
cobblemon.species.plaineon.name: Plaineon
cobblemon.species.plaineon.desc: Plaineon are more advanced, and powerful versions of Eevee. The fur on its body is said to protect it from the cold.
cobblemon.species.fenrour.name: Fenrour
cobblemon.species.fenrour.desc: Ancient Mythan tells of a tale of three wolves, and Fenrour is seen as the leader of the pack.
cobblemon.species.lihgeri.name: Lihgeri
cobblemon.species.lihgeri.desc: Lihgeri is said to be the guardian of Light, no one has ever seen it in person.
cobblemon.species.freknight.name: Freknight
cobblemon.species.freknight.desc: Freknight is said to be the guardian of Darkness, no one has ever seen it in person.
cobblemon.species.phenelpha.name: Phenelpha
cobblemon.species.phenelpha.desc: A Mythical Pokemon that is said to be the descent of Cresselia, although it seems a bit more evil.
cobblemon.species.hummony.name: Hummony
cobblemon.species.hummony.desc: A Mythical Pokemon that is said to be the descent of Cresselia, although it seems a bit more evil.
cobblemon.species.katuna.name: Katuna
cobblemon.species.katuna.desc: Due to the shape of its body, water flows quickly and easily past it. This makes it a fast swimmer.
cobblemon.species.maelstream.name: Maelstream
cobblemon.species.maelstream.desc: When it swims at high speed, it can't see its surroundings, so it often collides with walls or other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.skelachone.name: Skelachone
cobblemon.species.skelachone.desc: Its body has been eaten away, decreasing its weight drastically. It can now move at amazing speeds.
cobblemon.species.mintch.name: Mintch
cobblemon.species.mintch.desc: It builds its nest out of hardened mud. Sometimes, a Taillow will take over the nest for itself.
cobblemon.species.blakjak.name: Blakjak
cobblemon.species.blakjak.desc: The countless eyes on its wings can paralyze with a glare. The flock then surrounds the helpless victim.
cobblemon.species.pumpkid.name: Pumpkid
cobblemon.species.pumpkid.desc: The pumpkin is part of its body. When it senses danger, it hides its lower half and pretends to be a normal pumpkin.
cobblemon.species.wikkin.name: Wikkin
cobblemon.species.wikkin.desc: It carries a single leaf with it at all times. With one wave of the leaf, all surrounding Pokémon start to smile.
cobblemon.species.tentyrant.name: Tentyrant
cobblemon.species.tentyrant.desc: It lives in the pitch-black depths of the ocean, so it uses echolocation instead of its vestigial eyes.
cobblemon.species.dvaarak.name: Dvaarak
cobblemon.species.dvaarak.desc: It uses the drill on its nose to dig burrows and pitfalls. Its eyes are so weak, it can barely see anything.
cobblemon.species.doodloo.name: Doodloo
cobblemon.species.doodloo.desc: What looks like a face is actually scribbles drawn with berry juice. Its real face is on its stomach.
